"Damn it. I can't believe we shrunk," Aya said as Saya looked around the room.

Nick saw that Saya looked a bit sad. He still had the red ribbon and cat doll as he took their over size clothes and put them in their room.

"Say Maya, could you cool down your sister?" Nick asks as he thought stream was coming out of the middle sister's ears.

"Okay."

Maya went to Aya as Saya went over to Nick.

Saya couldn't believe at how big the young man was now. She was still shy but saw that he had the gifts that her sisters gave her in his hands.

"U-um...could you please give me those?"

Nick nodded as he put the cat doll near Saya.

"Here. I'll help you put this on," Nick offered as he untied Says' red ribbon. She was still nervous, but slowly went near the giant.

"Could you put yours arms up?"

Saya did as she was told as Nick ties the ribbon around her waist. He asked if he tied it too hard, but she shook her head. Saya has a bright smile on her face as she got on top of her cat doll and hugged it.

"T-thank you," Saya said with a bit of blush on her face.

"It's no problem at all. Besides you looked a bit sad without it."

Nick felt kind of weird at saying that, but he felt that Saya really liked the ribbon as much as the cat doll. Saya gave a friend small smile at Nick. Nick smlied back at the tiniest girl. Meanwhile at the other end. Maya and Aya were fighting.

"Aya, please calm down!" Maya asks the taller girl.

"But I can't! We're only inches tall! How can we survive this way?! Mom and Dad will not be back for months! And what if we get robbed or something!?"

Maya sighs as her sister listed out the negatives of being small. After Aya was done, the oldest sister saw Nick and Saya talking and him even helping put on her ribbon around her waist, seeing her smile. Maya was shocked - she rarely saw her sister smile outside of her own family.

"Well..Aya..I don't have the answers, but I can solve at least some problems."

Aya was shocked that her sister said that as the oldest shrunken girl went near Nick. Nick saw Maya coming and wonders what she wants.

"Nick, I know we haven't known each other for long, but could you please stay here and help us?" a blushing Maya requested. Nick was shocked at her request, as if she was asking her to move in with her.

"No way! We can't trust him!" Aya yelled with her arms crossed.

Nick looks at the shrunk sisters and then decides..
114231221121.title: The shrunken sister trio

choices: The sisters can't sleep and they want to talk to Nick.
They sleep and try to find the old man the next day.
1142312211211.content:
"Okay. I'll look after you three."

Maya and Saya smiled happily for offering to help them. Aya, however, grumbled.

"Well, it's a good thing it's summer or we would be in trouble," Nick says as look at the time. It was around 5:00 pm.

"It's time for dinner," Maya says as she wanted to make something for her sisters.

"Alright, Maya. Could you help me with dinner?" Nick asks as Maya agrees.

"You two stay here," Maya requested her sisters to do, who did as they were told.

Nick picks Maya up and places her on his shoulder. The two went into the kitchen. He had to admit that it was a nice kitchen. Maya made a gesture to the boy that he wanted on the kitchen table.

"Okay. I think I want to make some spaghetti and meat balls," Maya says as Nick nods alongside her. He looks around the kitchen's cabinets for what they need.

"Good thing you had some angel hair and regular noodles," he smiled as he placed the packages beside Maya.

"Okay!" Maya cheered. "I'll make the meatballs while you take care of the noodles and tomato sauce."

Nick kind of chuckled at the thought of the shrunken Maya making meatballs. Maya saw this and gave him an angry pout.

"Sorry, sorry."

Nick got all the ingredients out. as well as gave Maya the meat so she could make the balls. While she makes them, he starts to boil the water and make the sauce. It would only take a little bit of time for those ingredients to warm up, so he looks at what Maya was doing and saw that she was making a mess. The oldest sister was now covered in meat as she made some meatballs for Nick and small ones for her sisters.

"My my. The oldest looks like a little kid," Nick says to Maya as he smiles.

"Very funny. Stop making fun of this situation," she pouted in reply.

"Sorry. You're just easy to talk to. I mean you remind me of this one girl.."

Nick almost starts, but stops with an sad expression on his face. Maya noticed this and was worried about him. She walked a little closer to him.

"Nick?"

Nick shook his head.

"I'm sorry. I'll cook those meatballs now."

Maya watches as he tales her small and giant meatballs and put them in a pan.

"Um, could you get me some clothes?" Maya asks as she was dirty from making the meatballs.

"Um...sure."

Nick picks Maya up and put her near the sink. The sink was safe as the shrunken Maya wouldn't fall down the sink, especially with the plug put in the bottom center. Nick ran off to get Maya new clothes as Maya herself got the sun dress of and ran some of the water. Luckily her bathing suit was still clean so she took a clean off in the sink. Maya had to admit it was fun to use the sink as a bathtub.

"La la la", Maya began to sign with out realizing it.

As she sang, Nick came back with the clothes and saw that Maya was singing and now taking a bath with her bathing suit under her clothes. Nick blushed at seeing the sight - Maya was a cute girl, and her voice was very nice. Nick didn't want it to stop; he wanted to watch the shrunken older sister to sing some more.

"She really is just her...", Nick thought...but then he remembered he was cooking. "Crap! The food almost burnt!"

Maya heard Nick and turned around, seeing him taking the food off the stove and put it on the table. She looked at Nick with a question look on her face.

"Nick, how long were you there?"

Maya blushed at the thought of the giant seeing her in the bath (even with a bathing suit on) and singing.

"You're very cute, and you have a nice voice," he admitted. He knew he was trapped, so he might as well be honest.

Maya blushs at the comments. It's been a while since anyone really said that.

"Um, just give me my clothes."

Nick nods as he gave her a new black sweater, blue shorts, and a new swim bra and panties. He put the food on the table after completing it as Maya got dressed. After that, he placed her on his shoulder again and took the food to the living room, where Saya and Aya waited on the table.

"Dinner's ready," Maya said with a smile.

Saya and Aya smiled as they saw food they could eat. Then even had some small little forks. The shrunken sisters started to eat as Nick himself also ate his meal.

"Say Maya, do you remember what that old man looked like?" he asks.

"I do", she replied.

"So we're looking for him?" Aya asks.

Nick nodded but stop when he heard "we". The young man looked at the shrunken middle sister.

"Who said you were going?"

"I don't want to be separated from my sisters. Plus, I still don't trust you. Make sure you have one eye open tonight," Aya threatened him. She then took off her clothes and stared darkly into him.

"Aya!!" Maya scolded her as she slapped her with a noodle.

Despite her tiny size, Aya's glare at Nick gave him the creeps a bit. It looked like she was serious.."

"Thank you for the meal," Saya says as she finishes.

"You're welcome," Maya and Nick said together.

With dinner done, now the trio had to wonder about where they would sleep.

"Since we're so small, let's sleep together," Maya suggests.

"Fine, but I don't want to sleep near him," Aya notes, eyebrows lowered as she points to Nick.

"I'll sleep far away from you", he sighed, Aya nodding.

With that, it was now bed time for the three girls.
1142312211211.title: Request accepted!

choices: they start their search for the old man who gave Maya the perfume.
Saya is sick, and they need to stay home to look after her.
11423122112111.content:
Nick put the shrunken sisters on a chair. Since they were so small, a chair would do good. Nick also gave the shrunken sisters a blanket as well.

I'll be in the kitchen," Nick said to the shrunken sister trio as he left the room with their dishes as well. When Nick was out of the room, the sisters staredt to talk with each other.

"He's nice," Saya says with a smile as the youngest sister put her head on the cat doll. Aya, however, was still angry.

"Maya, could I talk to you for a moment?" the middle sister asked.

Maya saw that Aya had somewhat a blush on her face. Maya wonders what her sister was so embarrassed about.

"Okay."

Maya and Aya slowly got off the chair. The shrunken sisters made it far enough so that Saya couldn't hear them. The little sister was already dozing off, actually.

"Now what was it that you wanted to talk about, Aya?"

"Maya did you shrink out of your clothes?" Aya asked point-blank.

"No," Maya lied, hoping it would work.

"You lair! Saya and I shrunk out of our clothes! So the only logical pattern is that you shrunk out of your clothes."

Maya stood there wondering what should could say. Aya was very smart, so she would figure out what really happened.

"Well..." Maya began until Aya cut her off.

"I'm also guessing that Nick found when you were shrunken and naked as well?"

Maya blushes as the oldest sister remembered that incident.

"I knew it. I think I'll have a talk with him," Aya said as the small middle sister ran for the kitchen.

"AYA!"

Maya saw that Saya was coming down the chair near her, looking a bit tired.

"What's wrong with Aya, biggest sister?" Saya asks her older sister as she walks over next to her.

"She's being over-protective again. I wish she would just let me handle things."

Saya watched Maya cry a bit from her outburst.

"Let's go get Aya before she makes trouble," Maya told the youngest sister, who nodded and followed her sister as they chased her to the kitchen.

____________________________________________________________________________ _______

Aya was surprised at how far she had to run; the way to the kitchen was much further away than she expected at her size. (Aya really didn't like being small.) The shrunken middle sister saw that Nick was sitting at the kitchen table. He had a sketchbook and and pencils beside him. He was wearing a white shirt with a skull on it with a straw hat on the top of the head, as well as a pair of black pants. From what Aya could see that when she was original size, he would be about 5'9".

"What was he doing?" Aya thought as she went near Nick and pulled his pants leg.

"AAAAHHHH!!"

Nick jumped up in shock at the feeling of something on his pants leg. He then looked down and saw that it was just Aya, and he sighed a bit in relief. Though he wasn't too pleased to see her. Nick watched as the usually angry sister laughed at Nick's earlier screaming like a little girl. It made him feel a bit embarrassed..

"What do you want, you little brat?"

Aya stopped laughing as soon as she heard him call her a "little brat". Before she could yell, Maya and Saya made it over.

"Aya, did you say anything?" Maya asks with a worried look on her face.

"No. I was just going to ask him what he was doing before he called me a little brat."

Maya only sighed as as she knew somehow Aya must have made Nick mad.

"Y-you two need to say sorry to each other."

Nick and the two other shrunken sister looked at the tiniest sister. Maya smiled at her lovable little sister and how well she knew that fighting would not get you anywhere. So Maya hugged her sister as Nick and Aya both said at the same time,

"I'm sorry."

Maya smiled at their apology, even if they only did it to make Saya happy. Maya then looked up at Nick and saw that was drawing, walking a bit closer to him.

"So Nick, what are you drawing?"

"I'll just show you," he shrugged as he picked up the sister and put them on the table. The sisters saw the giant sketch book and saw a huge drawing; a replica of their kitchen.

"Wow, you're pretty good," Maya says as Nick felt a little happy.

"You think so?" Nick asks while scratching his head and smiling.

Aya then flips the page and saw more drawings. It was nothing but doodles.

"Ah. You found my one of my doodle ideas", Nick notes. Aya turns around and wonders what Nick was talking about. Saya saw a doodle of a cat and smiled as she stood on the giant sketch book.

"You really like cats, Saya," Maya says as she looked at the picture. Saya nodded as Nick saw Saya looking at it.

"Well, I have some materials. So I'll make a doll of that for you."

Saya lit up at Nick's selfless request, nearly hugging his hand. Aya was still skeptical, though.

"How do you know how to make a doll?" she wonders.

"You would be amazed at how much a costume doll goes for at an convention. But it does pay for the bills for the trip."

"So you want to be an artist?" Maya adds to the conversation.

"Very much so. I practiced a lot to get this good. But I'm still a beginner and there's still much for me to learn."

"C-C-Could you draw us?" Saya asks, blushing a bit.

"Okay, I'll draw you. But first I need to get something for you three to pose on.."

Nick went out of the room really quick to get something. The shrunken sisters all sat down, perplexed by what Nick was up to. He soon came back with Saya's cat doll and placed it on the table.

"I'll use that as a base for you three to sit on."

The sisters got off the giant sketch book and were now near Saya's giant cat doll. Nick turned to a new page and was ready to draw. He waited for the three shrunken sisters to pose before proceeding. Maya picks a simple pose as she stood in the middle. Saya was on the right and Aya was on the left. Maya put on a normal smile as Aya did her best at a sexy pose/ As Saya was still shy, she only blushing. Nick nods as he began to draw the shrunken sisters while they sat on top of the cat doll. It took about an hour before Nick was done.

"You three did a good at sitting still", he admits to them. "I'm impressed."

The sisters sighed as they wonder how the drawing went. Nick shows them the drawing; it was really good. He really got the sisters' good side.

"I got to admit, you drew us pretty good," Aya says with a smile. Maya was happy that Aya was lightening up on Nick.

"Can you color it?" Saya asks as Nick nods and closes the sketch book. There was a little piece of paper taped on the cover of the sketch book. It a simple drawing of a girl that was waving and saying "Love Ya".

"Is this from you girlfriend or something?" Aya asks as Maya had a angry look on her face. Nick had complemented Maya, so she was a bit jealous at the prospect of him cheating on her with another girl.

"You can say that...but we never really became an item," Nick sighs with as he crosses his arms. Aya looked at Nick, wondering what he was talking about.

"What do you mean?" Saya ask the giant. Nick looks at the youngest shrunken sister and stops to think about his word carefully.

"There was an accident when I was sixteen. She passed away, while I got a scar on my right shoulder."

Nick then showed a bit of the scar on his shoulder to the girls. It reached down near his chest.

"Before the accident, she put the doodle you see taped on my sketchbook in part of the jacket I use to wear."

"I'm sorry to hear that," May says with a saddened face. Aya and Saya also looked sad.

"Thanks, but let's not get too sad. We need to find a cure for you three," Nick smiles.

"Okay", all three sisters replied.

"Time for you three to go to bed. We're going to have a big day tomorrow."

Maya and Aya look at Nick with a bit of annoyance, wondering if he just made a pun. Nick stood there looking at them and starts to sweat at them not talking to him.

"Okay, could you help us go to the chair?" Aya asks.

Nick did as requested and picked up the three shrunken sisters (plus the cat doll) and put Aya and Saya down on the chair as Maya went to say something to him.

"Things will get better. Don't worry, we'll help you," May says as she kissed Nick on the cheek.

"No problem. Thanks", Nick replies, blushing a bit from the kiss. "I'll be on the couch if you three need me."

Nick then turned off the lights as he headed for the living room couch. As Saya made her way to her giant cat doll, Aya whispered something to her older sister.

"My, you're bold at kissing a guy you just met."

Maya blushed from the comment and looked at her sister with one of her cold stairs. Aya turned around and went to sleep. Saya went to sleep the instant she landed on her giant cat doll. Maya sighed as she was long overdue for sleep. Today was a surprising, long day for her, and tomorrow would probably long for her as well. She closed her eyes and wondered what tomorrow would bring.

The next morning...
11423122112111.title: Three shrunkees and a giant

choices: The old lady knows him. They have a lead!
She didn't know him. The four head home.
114231221121111.content:
Nick was the first to wake up the following morning. He was a bit dazed, but saw that he was not in his house. He then turned his head and saw that in the next room the three tiny sisters were sleeping near each other. He smiles at the sight of how close they were to each other. As an only child he never understood the whole sibling thing, but he knew when siblings were close when he saw them.

<<I better take a shower before they wake up>> Nick thought as he got some of the clothes he brought over when Aya and Saya were knocked out and made his way to the first floor bathroom.

Maya was waking up now and saw that world was still huge and that she and her sisters were still shrunk. Maya sighed as she didn't want to wake her sisters, so she carefully moved as to not wake them. Maya safely got off the chair and was still amazed by how small she was compared to the world. Maya walked around the giant living room and saw the bag that had the doll clothes.

<<I might as well try to take a shower>> Maya thought as she picked a white shirt, black sorts, a blue bra, panties, and a swim suit. Maya began to walk her long climb to the first floor bathroom when she heard running water. Maya figured that it was Nick taking a shower, so she thought of just waiting at the door for him to finish. However, when Maya finally got to the first floor bathroom, she saw the door was still open. Just then, Nick came out of the shower, and Maya's face was as red as a tomato. Maya saw Nick in all of his naked glory! And although she tried to cover her eyes as best she could, she admitted in her head that he looked quite handsome.

"Ah, nothing like a hot shower in the morning.."

Nick turns his head and sees that the door was still open. Not only that, but Maya was standing there, her face wide open and red as a beet. Nick's face soon become as red as hers as he closed the bathroom door. When Maya saw him open it again, he was now wearing a blue shirt with a milk carton that said "Drink strawberry milk" on it, as well as black shorts. again Nick was wearing a Blue shirt with a milk carton that said drink strawberry milk and black shorts.

"I'm sorry," Nick apologizes, still with a red face. Maya slowly nods with her face still red as well, but then comes with a smile and giggles. Nick was confused.

"Looks like we're even now," Maya says, still smiling with a blush on her face. Nick knew that she was talking about him seeing her naked. Nick chuckles about it was well.

"D-Do you need help getting to the sink?"

"I do, Nick. Thanks for asking."

Nick helps Maya get to the sink and left her to take her bath in peace. However, he stays close by the door to help her out when she finishes. When Maya finishes, Nick put her on his shoulder and helped her out of the bathroom. Soon after, though, they were greeted by the younger sisters, who also had clothes on them for a bath.

"I'm going to be taking a bath with Saya. So could you help get there, Bedhead?" Aya asks the sighing Nick, whose wet hair already dried and became the bed head hair he unfortunately was born with.

After Nick helps Aya and Saya in the sink, he and Maya get ready to make breakfast. The duo made blueberry pancakes, as well as scrambled eggs with orange juice (strawberry milk for Nick).

"We're done!" Aya yells as loud as she could, Saya parroting her.

Nick hears them quite clearly as he places Maya on the table. He then quickly heads up the stairs and helps the sisters out of the sink. Aya was now wearing a black sweater with a pair of short jeans, while Saya wore a white dress (her ribbon still tied to her waist) and black shorts underneath said dress. The four enjoy their meal, and when it was done Nick put the dishes in the sink and put on his socks and shoes.

"Before we go, do any of us have to use the restroom?" Nick asks as the shrunken sisters shook their heads. He then put on his jacket and put the girls in his pocket. Maya popped her head out, despising the idea of being a keychain for him..

____________________________________________________________________________ ______________________________

Nick and the shrunken sisters searched the town to find any clues any where the old man could be. The group kept on talking to people as Nick used the description that Maya gave him. But nothing was turning up.

After four hours of searching, Nick was now sitting on a bench, wondering how hard could it be to find a old man. The sisters were getting cramps from being in Nick's pocket for so long. They started at 8 a.m. and it was now noon.

"Nick, can we take a break?" Maya asks with a sweet smile.

"Okay, Let's just ask one more person first," he smiles back as he points to an old woman. He soon walked up to her to ask her as well about the perfume.
114231221121111.title: The search begins

choices: Maya then grows to about to 2 feet.
Maya falls asleep on Nick and Nick puts her back with her sisters.
1142312211211112.content:
"I'm sorry son, but I don't know anything about that guy or the perfume," the old woman replies with a smile.

"It's alright. Thanks for answering," Nick replies, looking distraught.

The old woman left as Nick and the three shrunken sisters wonder what they could do. They continue to search the entire town for some sort of clue, but nothing come up. Maya felt sad.

"Maya?" Aya asks as the middle sister felt her older sister's sadness from her body language. Saya was worried about her eldest sister as well, as she thought that Maya blamed herself for what happened to her sisters and herself.

"I'm fine!" Maya beams with a smile. Nick looked down and saw that something was wrong with Maya but didn't want to talk to her in front of her sisters.

"Let's go home. Let's play a game," Maya adds. She thought that maybe having fun with her sisters and Nick could lighten up the mood.

"Alright!" the other three replied back with a smile.

Maya smiles and hopes that a game would work to cure her depression. Nick walked over to their house and gently put them out of his pockets and onto the ground. He then opened the door for them, closing it as soon as they all got inside.

"So who's going to be it?" Aya asks as Saya smiles at the thought was playing with her sisters and Nick.

"It will be Nick", Maya decided.

"So I get the hard job", he sighed. "...since you guys are that small. ARGH this is going to be tough."

The shrunken sisters laughed as they got ready to hide. Nick closed his eyes and counted to one hundred. And that's how a day of games started.The group kept on playing games all day. (Nick lost every time when the shrunken sisters were to hide.) They even played bored games, The shrunken sisters loved it when they were playing Pictionary; Nick drew so good they could always tell what they were. Maya and Saya laugh as Aya had competition with Nick in some of the more intelligence-based board game. Sadly Nick lost near the end when the questions became impossible to answer for people who were not super smart like Aya. Nick had better luck when he was playing Battleship against the sisters. Saya beat everybody in SORRY. Maya won most of the card games.

By now it was getting late, and Nick & Maya made dinner for everybody. The dinner was just a simple sandwich, as they were low on food. (As such, food was slim pickings.) Aya and Saya were surprised at how tired they were after dinner. Nick picked ip the shrunken younger sisters and put them on the chair to sleep. Nick then looks for Maya so she could put her aside her sister.

Nick finally found Maya in her room on the second floor. Not just in her room, but on her bed. She had her knees up to her face and arms on her legs. Nick swore that he could see tears coming down her face.

"Maya?" Nick asks. "Is that you?"

"Hey, Nick. I'll be down in a second," the jumpy Maya replied with a smile.

"Maya..I'm not going anywhere."

Nick then slowly sat down next to the shrunken Maya. She looked up the giant, resisting the urge to cry in front of him. But Maya couldn't hide the tears anymore. Soon enough she was crying on his knee.

"I'm nothing but a stupid big sister! I couldn't even help my sisters to grow back to normal! W-what if Aya is stuck at the size for life and can't go on with her life?! Saya will never to be able to make friends at her size, too! They don't deserve this! I do, thought. I'm not as smart or cute as Aya, and I always make things worst for this family. It would be better I just shrink until I faded away!"

Nick couldn't believe what he just heardl Maya was blaming herself for the shrinking that it making the worst coming out of her. Nick thought that Maya was shrinking more now - she certainly looked smaller.

"Maya, it's not your fault," Nick tries to explain.

"It is my fault! If I hadn't brought it-!"

Nick put a finger on Maya's lip as he explained,

"Maya, you're one of the kindest people I know. Without you, your sisters would never be as close as they are. You're the glue that holds together; they would never blame you. They love you too much. Maya, you're smart and you can get people to like you for you trying to do the best for them. Everyone makes mistakes, heck I made a lot them and still do. And by the way Maya, you're beautiful. And any guy that doesn't see that is an idiot."

Maya looks at Nick and saw that he was serious, even blushing a bit. Mary smiles at Nick's kind words and made his red face even redder with her next action - she hugged his stomach. Nick smiled back as he put both of his hands across Maya's body. The two felt each other's warmth.
1142312211211112.title: No lead. No hope. Kindness still lives

choices: Maya does wake up eaily and pretends to wake up at the same time as Nick.
Aya and Saya wake up before Nick and Maya.
11423122112111121.content:
Nick felt something strange...a strange glow. Nick looked down at her and saw that she was growing in size.

"Maya, you're growing!" Nick exclaims as Maya opens her eyes and saw that she was getting larger. Maya felt happy until she heard ripping - her doll clothes were ripping apart! Before Maya could say anything to Nick about closing his eyes, her clothes were done. Nick's face was bright red once more as he saw Maya in her naked glory. This time he had a better view of her, and he would still say that Maya was beautiful. Maya blushed more and felt her heart was beating faster. To Maya it felt strange for her heart to beat this way. The two were still hugging each other as Nick felt her nude body press against his. The two stood there until they both let go.

"Nick, there's still some of my old children's clothes in Saya's room. Could you get them for me?" Maya asks with her face still red. Nick nodded and went to get Maya new clothes. Nick come back with a light blue shirt, grey skirt, and black shorts. Maya put them on as Nick turns away to give her private time to put on her clothes. Maya was full clothed when Nick turned around.

"I brought some more measuring tape," Nick said with a blush still on his face as he still felt Maya's warmth. Maya nods as she wonders what her height was. Nick measured the taller Maya and told her her new height.

"Your 2'6". So half of your original height,"

Maya was so surprised at how big she was now.

"What do you think made me grow?" Maya asks Nick. Nick was wondering about that as well.

"Well, if I still had that power I could tell you. But I'm as stump as you are."

"Power? What do you mean, Nick?"

Nick looked at Maya and he found it best to just tell her the whole story.

"When my friend Trucy and I had the accident with a helicopter falling on us, I gained a strange power. I got more o anf explanation when Trucy came back as a shrunken angel. I gained the power to look for people and fix their problems. If I didn't help with their problems, my flesh would rot. That's one of the reasons I made many friends in high school. But I lost the power when I solved one last problem."

"Who was the one who had the problem?"

"I did. I didn't accept Trucy's death. I just kept thinking that we could always to be together. But I learned to move froward and knew that I had friends that would help no matter what."

Nick finished and didn't hear Maya talk for a bit.

"Now, I understand if you don't believe me..," Nick added.

"You're talking to a girl who has been shrunk. I think I can believe you having that kind of power," Maya replied with a smile.

"It's time for bed. We're going to have a long day at tiring to figure out how you grew," Nick said as he tried to get up. But Maya stopps him with a hug. Nick blushes at the half-sized girl hugging him.

"Nick, would you stay with us? Even if my sisters and me were still small?" she asks.

"Of course. We're friends, and friends don't leave each other."

Maya smiled as she liked the thought of Nick just staying with them. The two then went back downstairs. Nick said goodnight to Maya as he soon fell asleep on the couch. Maya was about to sleep along with her sisters but went over to Nick and crawled under the covers with him.

<<I'll wake earlier than anyone and go where my sisters are>> Maya thought as liked Nick's warmth.
11423122112111121.title: Maya's growing feeling and heart

choices: Switch to Saya walking in the backyard.
Stick with Maya and Aya looking for Saya.
114231221121111211.content:
Maya woke up first the following morning. The haft-sized woman looked up and saw that she was still next to Nick. She smiles as she crawls out of Nick covers, and walked slowly over to where her sisters were. When she got to her smaller sisters, she felt weird being taller than Aya. It's been many years since Maya was taller then Aya.

"I wonder how my sisters are going to react when they see that I grew?" Maya whispers as she heard a yawning Nick in the back. Maya turns to look at the young man with a smile.

"Morning, Maya," Nick says to her with a smile.

"Morning, Nick," Maya happily replied back, blushing a bit. Nick smiled at this sight.

"I think I'll go to my house and get some food. Why don't you take a bath?" he asks as he puts on his shoes and a brown jacket. Maya nods as she hugs Nick.

"Okay. Be back soon, okay?"

Nick smiles and hugs her back. The two of them let go after a long hug as Nick went to his house to pick up food. Maya smies as she turns around and sees her sisters waking up. As expected, they were surprised that she grew over two feet since they last saw her."

"Maya, how did you get that big?!" Aya gasps, Saya hugging her oldest sisters' leg.

"I don't know, but with this I know we can return back to normal," she replies with a smile as she hugged both of her sisters. They proceeded to hug her back.

All three sisters proceeded to take a bath. With Nick gone, Maya chose their new set of clothes for the day after she placed Aya and Saya in the sink for their bath. Aya pondered in the bath to herself.

<<How did Maya return to normal? It can't be a time thing, or else Saya and I would be growing now. Maybe she ate something, or perhaps she's secretly a magician? Nah, that's silly. I think I need to ask her point-blank about this. I bet it has something to do with Mr. Bed Head.>>

After the bath, the shrunken sisters got their clothes on. Maya had on a white shirt and gray shorts, Aya a black dress with white underwear, and Saya a blue shirt, white shorts, and her red ribbon tied around her waist. When they were all out, they entered the living room.

"When Nick get's back, he'll help me make us all breakfast. What do you guys want?" Maya cheerfully asks.

"Mayam what did you do last night after Saya and I went to sleep?" Aya interrupted.

"I didn't do anything. I just talked to Nick last night. Then I grew."

"What did you two talk about?"

Maya blushed a bit at her question.

"Well, I was down in the dumps and he helped me out."

Aya was shocked to hear what Maya had said. Sure the oldest sister had kissed Nick on the cheek, but Maya's face was fulling blushing. Maya had fallen for Nick!

"Maya, have you fallen for Nick?!" Aya yelled in shock.

"I might have, yes.."

Aya stood there a minute. Maya had other crushes and dated them, before but this felt strange. She just thought Maya was being nice when she kissed him on the cheek. It's what little girls did to show they had crushes on boys.

"You just met the guy two days ago! How can you say that you love him?! You're just rushing in this! You need to take time."

"Aya, I think I can handle this myself! Just because you think all the boys at your school are perverts doesn't mean that every guy is! Who I date is none of your business.

Saya watched her two older sisters bickering; not an uncommon thing for her to endure at home. The baby of the family ran away on impulse at this point whenever the two started shouting at each other. She decided to escape outside, crawling underneath the door on all fours to get out. In the process, though, she left her ribbon undone in the kitchen, as it came off her waist as he crawled under the door.

____________________________________________________________________________ _____________________

After some time Maya and Aya stopped fighting and simply looked at each other. After a final stare contest, they both stopped. Their eyes softened up as they looked at each other.

"I'm sorry Maya, but you always get hurt when jerks dump you," Aya explains.

"I understand, Aya. Thank you for looking out for me."

Maya picks up the tiny Aya and hugs her. Aya hugs back, feeling comfortable around her older sister. After they were done making up, they looked down and noticed that Saya was gone.

"Where did Saya go?" Maya asks, looking worried.

"Do you think she went outside? Like she typically does when we fight?" Aya replies.

"But at her size, she'll...! SAYA!!"

A Maya horrified ran for the back yard door. Aya followed her far behind as fast she could at her tiny stature. When she made it to the door, Maya saw Saya's ribbon right next to the door on the floor. She then showed it to Aya when she caught up.

"We have to go out there and find her!" Maya proclaims as she opens the door. It didn't help that their backyard was huge even at their regular sizes.
114231221121111211.title: Littler sisters met "big" sister

choices: Nick comes back and finds her being chased.
1142312211211112111.content:
Not realizing her sisters made up, Saya navigated outside through the tall blades of grass. She was amazed at bugs who, to her, were the size of dolls, and butterflies that looked as if her 8 year-old self could ride then. She was still scared by her tiny size, but she overlooked it as she walked through the beautiful backyard's sights.

<<I hope Maya and Aya are done fighting. I don't like it when they fight>> Saya thought to herself as she walks.

Unknown to Saya, one of the bushes was shaking. There was an animal that was looking at the five inch Saya. It was a small dog that was a bit mean. Although she saw the bush move a bit, Saya didn't see the dog until it nearly jumped her.

"N-N-Nice doggie," Saya says to the dog, backing away. The dog barked in reply.

"AAAAAAAHHHH!!," Saya screams as the quite literal little girl ran from the dog. She was too terrified to do anything but run.

"Someone please save me!!" she cried as she ran from the dog.
1142312211211112111.title: Saya's adventure in the backyard

choices: The group goes back inside the house.
11423122112111121111.content:
Nick had some plastic bags in his hands as walked about the sisters' house. As he worried whether or not he got food they like, he had a small dog barking, walking behind the house to see it chasing something in the backyard. At first Nick thought it was chasing a squirrel or some other small rodent, but a second look revealed long, dirty blonde hair in the tall grass. He quickly remembered that it was probably Saya! He dropped his bags and hopped the fence to help her.

Saya was still running as the dog neared her closer and closer each time she ran. Saya stopped after a while, crying as the dog came for her...until it was stopped by a giant hand in front of her. Saya looked up and saw that the giant hand was Nick's. She smiled brightly at the giant.

The dog then quickly bit Nick's hand. He writhed in the pain of the small dog's sharp teeth, hitting it on the head. This caused the dog to whine and run off to another yard. With that done, Nick looked down at the tired, red-faced Saya.

"Are you alright, Saya?" Nick asks with a smile. But all he saw was Saya crying.

"S-Saya! Did I scar you? I tripped back there. So I'm sorry if I scared you.."

As he asked the crying girl, Maya and Aya ran up to her as well. Maya scooped up her baby sister and cuddled her in her arms.

"Saya, are you okay?!" the worried eldest sister asked. "I'm so sorry!"

"What's wrong, Saya? You're not hurt, are you?" Aya asks.

"No, but Nick got hurt because of me," Saya replied as she pointed to Nick's left hand. There were quite visible teeth marks, and blood also dripped from his hand.

"Saya, I had worst. It's just a bite," Nick replies, trying to mask the pain from her.

"But you didn't have to do that. Why did you do that?"

"Because we're friends, right?"

Saya was shocked to hear Nick say that. The young girl didn't really have friends outside of her family, mainly due to her acute shyness.

"D-do you mean that, Nick?"

"You bet. Who wouldn't want to be friends with you? I know that your a bit shy, but you'll get over it. You have the same friendly personality as your sisters."

Saya smiles brightly, Aya and Maya also smiling soon after. It's been a long time since she opened up to someone outside of her family.
11423122112111121111.title: Nick and Saya's little talk

choices: ..she tries to think of a way to return to normal.
..she was having trouble in her room.
114231221121111211111.content:
As they smiled, Nick, Maya, and Aya saw that Saya was glowing. Not just glowing, but getting bigger by the second. Nick pulled his jacket off quickly and gave it to Saya before her clothes ripped off her body. Luckily, the jacket was big enough to cover her whole body.

"I'm bigger!' Saya smiles as Aya was shocked to be the smallest in her family.

"I'll get these two inside," Maya says as she picked up Aya and placed her in the pocket of Nick's jacket that Saya was wearing. She then grabbed Saya's hand and led the three girls back inside. Nick went back to get the bags of food before joining them as well back in the house.

____________________________________________________________________________ ______________________

With the dog incident over, Nick unpacked the food and made waffles. He also poured for drinks orange juice; during this time, Saya got re-dressed in a white dress with grey shorts.

"I measured Saya. She's 1'6" now, about half her original size", Maya smiles.

As they sat down for food, Aya looked at her two sisters and wondered how they grew. She was so deep in thought, she didn't even notice Maya picking her up and placing her on the table so she could eat. After breakfast was over, Nick and Maya did the dishes, while Saya held on to Aya, the latter proceeding to ask her questions.

"Saya, what do you think of Nick?"

Saya stopped and blushed a bit as she replied,

"I like him."

Aya figured that Saya had a crush on Nick now. She figured it was puppy love for her. She was more concerned as to why her older sister Maya seemed to have fallen for a man she barely even knew.

"Saya, can you take me to my room. I'm going to study. I want to be alone."

"Okay, Aya."

Saya did what her smaller, but older, sister told her, heading up the stairs much easier now that she was taller. It still was a fairly long climb, though. She opened the door for her to her room, watching Aya walk back into her room on her own. After she was done, Saya walked back downstairs.

"Saya, where's Aya?" Maya asks.

"She's up in her room."

"Oh, alright. I guess she's studying now."

"What do you want to do now?" Nick asks Saya as he placed some bandages on his wounds.

"You want to watch a movie?" Saya cheerfully asks, Nick nodding in reply.

"You girls pick something and I'll watch it with you. It sounds fun."

Maya and Saya nodded happily in reply as they looked through their DVD collection. Meanwhile, with Aya..
114231221121111211111.title: Odd (shrunken) girl out

choices: ..Aya was angry, and there were thousands of papers near her.
1142312211211112111111.content:
"Now I need to figure out at how to grow big. Now what was it that made Maya and Saya?" Aya thought as the shrunken middle sister got a giant pencil and a piece of paper. She starts to all their names on a piece of paper. Aya had a hard time writing with the giant No. 2 pencil.

"Hmmm...Saya became bigger again after Mister Bed Head saved her," Aya thinks to herself. "He also said that he was Saya's friend. Saya has always had trouble with getting friends. Does that mean that he can help her with her problem? And Maya was down in the dumps when we couldn't find anything on the old man. Does that mean Bed Head helped Maya get out of her depression, which also caused her to grow?"

Aya proceeds to write down the reasons as to how her sisters grew.

"I think they solved a problem in their lives. Which means that I need to think of a problem I have myself in order to get bigger. But I can't think of any right now. One thing's for sure, though; I don't want any help from him."

Aya then began to think and think about any problems she had. She stood there wondering of what shortcomings, negative aspects, or trauma she had in her life right now, but aside from guys in school drooling over her, she really couldn't think of any. The frustrated girl shook her head as she began to write things down.

____________________________________________________________________________ ______________________________________

Nick, Maya, and Saya spent the entire day watching movies. Nick was enjoying the animation and artwork in the movies they saw. Maya enjoyed any aspects of their movies that had happy endings. The young Saya simply enjoyed any movie that had cute cats in them. It was 7 p.m. before Nick looked at the time.

"It's late. No wonder why I'm hungry," he said as he got up and saw that the half-size sisters were also quite hungry.

"I'll cook us something," he tells them as he gets up, Maya following him. Saya stayed on the couch and continued watching movies.

"I'll help, too", the cheerful Maya says, standing close to Nick.

"Thanks, Maya. Though could you get your sister Aya out of her room for dinner, possibly?"

"I'll just Saya to get her."

Nick sighed as he placed a hand on the tiny waitress' shoulder. "I think there's something troubling your sister. I'd talk to her myself, but I would only make things worse. Please, Maya."

Maya knew that Aya was having trouble with Nick being here; she was not a fan of her falling so easily for him so soon. Maya sighed as she nodded at Nick and walked out of the kitchen.

"Okay, I'll go and have a talk with her."

"Thank you."

Nick smile as he watched Maya go up the stairs to the middle sister's room. Noticing that it was closed, Maya knocked on the door.

"Aya, I came here to take you for dinner and to talk to you about something," Maya says with a calm voice.

"Don't come in!" Aya yells through the door. Maya though something was wrong with her little sister.

"I'm coming in!" Maya yelled as she opens the door with her two hands and saw that..
1142312211211112111111.title: Little Aya wants to solve the problem

choices: Maya takes Aya to Nick and the two try to help Aya.
Maya can't think of anything at the moment.
11423122112111121111111.content:
Maya couldn't believe her eyes - Aya was smaller now! She had to rip some of the doll clothes and make herself a toga just to stay dressed. Maya carefully approached her very tiny little sister.

"Aya, we need to show you to the others."

"No way! I can solve this problem on my own! We don't need to show Bed Head that I got smaller!"

Maya was surprised to hear that.

"But Aya, you're smaller. We need to tell Nick and Saya so they can help you out."

Aya shakes her head as she continues to write.

"Don't worry, Maya.I can think of a way for us to grow back to normal. We don't need Bed head help,"

Maya watches as her younger sister kept on writing. She seemed to have been using it for a while - it was now nearly as small as her.

<<I need to help Aya.>> Maya sighed as she stared at her sister.
11423122112111121111111.title: Even tinier middle sister

11423122112111121111112.content:
Maya saw that Aya's room was covered in papers. Practically the whole floor was nothing but sketches, graphs, thoughts, comments, or formulas. Her bed and desk were also covered in papers as if they were her own sheets.

"Aya, are you trying to find a way to be bigger?" Maya asked as she picked up one of the scattered papers. Aya was still writing even as she asked.

"No, I'm doing homework. Of COURSE I'm trying to find a way to get bigger! And not without you and Saya's boyfriend's help, either!"

Saya blushed deep red. "He's not my boyfriend!" she replied. "He's just...really important to me."

"That's nice. Now out of my way, big sister. I'm going to show you that I can get bigger not through love or being saved like a damsel in distress, but by my own brains."

"But Aya...Nick has the ability to help you like he did us..."

"Not. Interested. Now get out, Maya!"

Maya sighed as she did as told, closing the door on her busy sister. Even when night passed, Aya was still toiling away, a normal-sized cup of coffee next to her as she worked, with a little straw to drink out of. (Saya gave it to her upon request.)
11423122112111121111112.title: Little girl, lots of papers

114231221121111211111122.content:
By this point the tired Aya had been sitting there for over 12 hours, even working in the early hours of the night. Her bedroom not had TWICE the papers it did since Maya visited her! Aya was growing frustrated from not being able to find the answers for restoring her size. When she finally took a breather, she turned her head and saw that her electric clock said it was 3 a.m.

"I need to take a break. There's no way I'm giving up," Aya says to herself as she stretches. She then figures it would be best to get someone to get the the normal sized coffee cup out of her room. Aya started to move under her door and heads down the stairs to get one of her sisters. When going down she saw that Saya was asleep in her room, her snoring visible to her tiny ears. The 5 inch tall Aya soon made it to the ground floor to search for Maya. It didn't take long for her to find her half-size older sister at the table in the kitchen beside Nick.

"Maya, you got to go to bed. I'm sure everything with Aya will be fine," Nick says as he nudges Maya.

"No. I can't yet. I have make sure she's alright. I'm worried about Aya. She very stubborn," Maya explains as she drinks some coffee Nick left out for her.

"She's really lucky to have sisters that care for her. I think Saya would have stayed up late if she was a bit older," Nick said as Maya nods with a little blush on her.

"Oh please", Aya moans. "What a cornball."

"You're just being kind...say if you still had your power, how would you help Aya?" Maya asks as she takes another drink.

"Well, first I would need to see a black aura around her. Then, by force from that power, I'd have to draw her heart in my sketch book or any piece of paper."

"You mean like a heart?"

"No. I would draw what I thought of the world of her heart. I would then dive in the picture and solve the problem. The problem with is that my counselors only enter the picture, while my body is dead a like a door knob. If my body get's hurt I'll be feeling the pain, and if I feel the pain in the picture it will go away when I go back to my body. Now if the picture or my body get destroyed, I'm gone. It also is true if the person I enter their heart dies; I die along with them."

Maya looked at Nick and nods. She wondered herself what it would be like to enter another person's heart.

"You also said that Trucy come back. Did she go with you when you entered a person's heart?"

"She did. Without her I think I would have died a couple of times. Even when I knew their problems, I still couldn't fix them on my own. So I was, or still am, kind of an idiot."

Maya looked at Nick and smiled at him.

"You're not an idiot", she told him.

Nick sighs as he thinks about the first time he tried to help someone, he ended up accusing the woman of an abortion.

"No, I am. But I think your sister can find the way to make you guys bigger."

Aya perked her ears at hearing what Nick just said.

"You think so?" Maya asks as she saw Aya in the distance, listening to their conversation. She decided to let Nick keep talking.

"Your sister has incredible love channeling from her. I also think she might be the smartest person I know. If anyone's going to get you guys back to normal, it will be her. She'll do so through the sheer power of her drive. It's a good thing to have in this world."

Nick smiles as Aya hears every word of what he just said about her. It's true that not every body said that about her - most accused her of being smarter than her, or that she got "lucky". Her teachers said she was smart, but those were just the teachers being teachers. Aya blushed deep red at Nick's kind words. It was the first time someone outside of her family or her friends said she was smart. The blushing Aya comes up and looks up at the two, about to apologize about last night.
114231221121111211111122.title: Aya's break..and eavesdropping

choices: ..Nick gets a call about a tip about the old man who gave the perfume.
..Nick wakes up to see the haft-sized sisters looking at him.
1142312211211112111111221.content:
As Aya blushes, she felt her clothes ripping, and her body glowing. Maya quickly noted this as well and ran from the chair she was sitting on in and ran to the living room. A confused Nick wondered what she was doing as Maya threw a blanket on a seemingly random spot on the living room floor.

"Thanks, Maya," Aya says as she was happy that she was covered up with something.

"You're welcome", Maya smiles back. "But it seems like you did get help from him."

Aya stops and blushes in embarrassment. She didn't want to admit it, but Nick saying that she was smart really did make the middle sister happy.

"Yeah. So what?" the annoyed girl asked her older sister.

"You have to go and say thank you to him", Maya said as she measured her sister with measuring tape. "Your 2'8" now..half size like Saya and me."

Aya was about to argue back, but saw that Maya wouldn't being taking any kind of arguments from her.

"Fine. I'll just make it quick."

Nick was still in the kitchen and saw the haft-size sister coming in with a blanket covering her.

"Whoa! You grew. How did you do that?" Nick saids as he stood up and bent down to look at Aya. This caused her to blush from looking at him so close.

"I figured out the problem. But I don't know how to find the way to grow us back all the way," Aya says, there being some truth in what she said.

"Well, with you around, we'll get your sisters back to normal."

Nick then pats Aya's head, causing her to blush. But since she wasn't used to it, she punched in the face. Nick then fell down on the floor from the velocity of said punch.

"S-STOP complementing me! Jeez! I'll being sleeping in my room. Good night," Aya sighs, her face still red. She turned around so Nick couldn't see her red expression, while Maya giggled at Aya being shy around a boy. She then looked over the area Aya punched him at.

"Sorry about that", she says as she places a Band-aid on the area.

"Don't worry about it", Nick replies, shaking his head. "This isn't any worst than any getting hit by fastballs."

Maya wonders what Nick was talking about look on her face. He replies with an "another time" look on his face. Leaving the kitchen, Maya went upstairs to check on Aya, who was now in a black shirt and blue shorts.

"I think I'll say thanks later. I think I'll say it when I'm back to normal," Aya says as she goes to sleep.

Maya nods as the oldest sister goes to her bed room to go to bed. Nick, for the second night in the row, was asleep on the couch. The next morning..
1142312211211112111111221.title: Three Half-Size Sisters

choices: Saya was now her original size!
Saya was wearing brand-new clothes that Maya and Aya never saw before.
11423122112111121111112212.content:
"Morning, Nick!" Saya smiles as she pressed her cat doll in front of his face to "kiss" him.

"Good morning, Nick!" Maya then follows as she winks at him.

"Hi...Nick", Aya dryly finishes.

"Morning, girls. Why are you three so happy to see me?" Nick asks as he stretches, sitting up on the couch. Aya, Maya, and Saya sit down beside him - Aya to the left, and Maya and Saya to his right.

"Since we're taller now, we figure we could go out somewhere", Maya says. "A day of cabin fever kind of struck us all, as you can see." Saya held up to Nick's face a newspaper clipping of the local aquarium.

"Saya also likes fish", Maya explains. "I planned to take her there originally before we shrunk, but as you can see... However, with your help, I think we could do so."

"I'm also interested in the aquarium", Aya adds, looking a lot happier. "They got a lot of new exhibits recently, and I want to check them out."

"Well, if you three don't mind disguising yourself as kids, I don't see why not", Nick says to the girls, patting Saya's head especially.

"Thank you, Nick!" she smiles as she kisses his face cheek, shocking Maya and Aya.

Saya happily ran up the stairs to get into the shower, singing happily to herself. Maya and Aya, meanwhile, looked at Nick dumbfounded.

"*I* don't even kiss Saya, not even good night", Maya gasps. "She must really like you."

Aya nodded, super surprised herself. "The last time I saw her kiss us is when we got her her cat doll and ribbon respectively on her birthday a couple of years back."

Nick was still shocked himself of the kiss. Granted, it was one from a child, but that was still the first he had since Trucy's.

"Well, I'm going to get a shower", Nick excuses himself. "After that I'll make food."

"Sure thing", Maya and Aya reply as they watch walk up the steps. The two then retreated into the kitchen.

------

In the kitchen Maya made the sisters and Nick breakfast, which today was French toast. Maya still had to still use a stool to make food, but she was very careful and did so with little problems. She was glad Nick had placed for her and her sisters everything off the high shelves and down lower for them to easily access last night.

"Oh my God, did you see that? Saya was sooo adorable!" Maya squeals. "I wish I had a camera when I saw her face light up!"

"I kinda do, too", Aya admits. "I remember when I was that carefree."

"I think we're going to have a lot of fun today, don't you? Maybe we might...find that guy again..." Maya trails off.

"Somehow I doubt an aquarium is where a guy who has a perfume whose contents can shrink people to 5 inches tall would hang out", Aya shrugs. "Whatever the case, I'm glad we're even half our size now."

"You never know, little sister of mine. People can pop up in the least likely of places."

"Maybe. Still, it's nice to get our minds out of shrinking at least for a day, huh? I can't even remember the last time you, Saya, and I went out together on a family outing."

"They have been pretty rare since Mom and Dad went overseas. I wish we could do it more often myself.."

As Maya and Aya continued to talk, the food got cold. It was nearly 20 minutes before anyone interrupted their quiet breakfast time.

"I'm done, Maya and Aya! I'm coming for some delicious food now!" the cheerful Saya says as she walks into the kitchen.
11423122112111121111112212.title: Waking up not to an alarm, but three cute girls.

choices: The group had a fun time at the aquarium.
114231221121111211111122121.content:
Maya and Aya were shocked to see that the baby of the family was the first to grow to normal size. There Saya stood in her original attire: the red ribbon back in her hair, rainbow earrings, and a black, frilly dress down to her knees with frills, as well as polka dots at the end of it. She was also carrying her cat doll with ease.

“Saya, you’re bigger!” Aya gasps. Maya took the measuring tape from a drawer in the kitchen and measures her baby sister.

“You're 3'10. Your original size",” Maya smiles.

“R-really?!” Saya asks, smiling as well. "That's great!"

“I smell breakfast, Maya. Did you cook it?” Nick’s voice came from upstairs.

Shortly after he asked, Nick was down the stairs. He is wearing a blue and purple striped shirt, black pants, a blue jacket with a cartoon skull that wore a straw hat whose sleeves were rolled up to his elbows. He also wore a silver watch on his right wrist, blue and white striped socks, and brown sandals on his feet. Lastly he had a sketchbook and tons of pencils in his hands, along with a bag to them all in. He soon dropped the bag when he saw Saya.

“I’m back to my normal size!” Saya smiles as she hugs her two sisters. with a smile as she hugged her two sisters. The smaller sisters hugged back. When Saya was done she went over to Nick.

Nick smiles back at her as he pats her head. “That’s good. Looks like you’re the big sister now.”

“Since you two are done taking a shower, Aya and I have to take one. Make sure to eat breakfast, you two.” Maya says as she grabs Aya’s hand and heads up the stairs. Nick and Saya saw the French toast on the table left b the half-size sisters and started to eat.

“Maya, how do you think Saya grew back to normal?” Aya asks as held the clothes she would wear that day.

“I don’t know. But do you think she got over another problem of hers?” Maya replies as she finished picking out her own clothes.

Aya wonders about that herself as the two took a shower.

___

Nick and Saya were now done eating. Nick also cleaned the dishes as Saya helps him. He also told her that the reason why he brought the sketchbook was to draw some of the fish, or anything else that caught his fancy.

“We’re ready,” Nick and Saya heard Maya say from upstairs.

Nick and Saya watched as the haft-sized sisters come down the stairs. Maya had a shirt on that had a cartoon white cat head on it, a cute, little black skirt, and brown shoes with pink socks on. Aya had on a pink shirt with a cartoon black cat, a white skirt, and black shoes with white socks. Maya also had a camera in her hand.

“Looks like everybody is ready,” Nick says as Aya goes up to him.

After that, it was time to get ready to leave. Maya informed Nick of where the keys to the house were as he made everything was locked before they left. Nick let the girls go out in front of him as he searched the house one more time. When he was certain that everything was locked, he then locked the front door.

“Let’s get walking,” Maya says as she starts forward, only to be stopped by Saya when she walks in front of everyone else.

“But I thought you were going to act like a little kid?” Saya reminded her sister.

“You're right. She did say that, didn't I? Okay Saya, what do you think we should do?” Aya asks.

Saya thought about it for a moment. She then grabbed Maya and Aya’s hands and went over to Nick. Nick put all of his stuff in his bag as Saya put her two older sisters' hands on Nick’s. Aya right hand was being held by Nick’s left, while Nick’s right hand held Maya’s left hand.

“There we go. I always see that little kids have to hold someone hands,” Saya says with a smile.

Maya and Aya blushed as they held hands with Nick.

“Okay. Saya, stay close okay?” Nick tells her.

“Just be careful,” Maya adds, a blush on her face from holding Nick's hand as the four headed to the aquarium.
114231221121111211111122121.title: The youngest sister is now the biggest

choices: The sisters talk about what to do.
Switch to Nick and what's he's doing inside Wyllt's heart.
1142312211211112111111221212.content:
After a bit of walking, the quartet made it to the aquarium. Nick paid for the tickets as the four go inside.

“Have fun with your kids, sir,” the young, attractive lady clerk says as she winks at him. Maya felt a bit jealous at this, while Aya just felt strange being called a kid again. Nick, meanwhile, was wondering what to draw.

“I’ll pay you back for the tickets,” Maya says, as she didn’t like that Nick had to spend his money.

“Don’t worry about it. Just think of as my gift to you,” Nick replies as Maya blushes a bit.

Aya picks up a pamphlet to see what exhibits were new. Her eyes automatically locked on to the new events, with Saya hovering above her. Nick got his sketchbook and some pencils out, looking ready to draw.

“Let’s go to the first exhibit,” Saya says as the baby sister wanted to look at every exhibit.

“Okay,” Maya nods as the group went to the first exhibit. There Saya watches as the fish were swimming in tanks, dazzled by what she sees. Aya looked around for videos or fact sheets abut the fish to check if there were any new ones. Maya was watching the fish, but she was also looking at Nick time to time drawing. She walks closer to him to see what he was drawing.

“What are you drawing there, Nick?”

“Well..some fish.”

Nick lowers his sketchbook so that Maya could see the fish he was sketching. They seemed so life-like; even the water seemed real, despite being in black and white.

“Your drawings are amazing, Nick."

“That’s what you get from drawing all the time.”

Nick quickly froze shortly after the compliment, only picking up a finger and pointing it. Maya had no idea what he was doing until he turned around and saw what he was pointing at. Turns out it was the old man who gave Maya the perfume, and he was on the other side of the fish tank!

“He’s here. Nick let’s go and talk to him,” Maya says as the oldest sister turn her head to see Nick agree with her. But Nick had flip to the next page of the sketch book and started to draw at ridicules speeds.

“Maya, what’s wrong with Nick?” Aya asks as she and Saya went over to where Maya and Nick where.

“We found the old man. Let’s go get him,” Nick informs the clueless middle sister as as he walked to the right side of the tank and was still drawing. The sisters wonder how in the world he could draw like that. But the sisters walked around the other side; if the old man ran away from Nick, they could at lest block him from that side. As he drew, Nick wondered what was going on with him. He hadn’t drawn like since when he had his power. He figured he got his power back when he saw the black aura around the old man.

“Let’s not dive in right away,” Nick says. "I don't want to faint in the aquarium." He finished the picture as he was in front of the old man. “Hello, Sir. I was wondering if you could answer some questions?”

“Hello young man. My name is Wyllt. What kind of questions would you like to ask me?”

“I would like know why you would give that kind of perfume to my sister?” Aya asks from behind the old man. The old man turns around and sees the shrunken girl, as well as the half-size Maya and Saya.

“Maya, is that you? Looks like that perfume worked,” Wyllt says with a smile as Maya got angry at the old man.

“What do you mean it worked?! Do you even know what you made me and my sisters go through?”

People around started to stair and watch the scene.

“Could we go somewhere private for this?” Nick asks everyone.

"I agree. We are drawing a crowd", Aya nods.

“Fine. But don’t think you can run, old man,” Maya informs the man with a serious face.

“I promise I will not run away, little one."

Maya didn't believe him, but she had to for now. The group then went outside and found a small, grassy area to talk at. Saya stays behind Nick, as she was afraid at what Maya and Aya were going to talk about with the old man. Nick watches and wonder at how this would end. Saya saw that Nick was sweating a bit.

“I think the biggest question here is; why did you gave that perfume that made me shrink?” Maya asks.

“It seemed like you need to be have a little bit of help", Wyllt replies. “So I figured that the perfume would work well for any troubles at home.”

Maya and Aya were shocked to hear that. Did Wyllt really mean it when he said he meant to shrunk them to make them solve some of their problems?

“What the hell are you talking about?! Who give you the right to “help us”!” Aya yelled.

“I think I did help you. You see, for each problem you solve, you grow. And it seems like your baby sister solved all of her problems.”

<<What is he talking about?>> Maya thought to herself. Sure, Saya got over her fear over meeting new people. The other problem...could it be that Saya want to spend more time with her family?>> Maya looked over at Saya, who was still a little worried.

“That still doesn't make up for you shrinking us,” Aya replies, still sounding enraged.

“I’ll make it up with you when you two grow back to your normal size. Besides I can’t un-shrink you. You have to solve your own problems", Wyllt sighs.

<<I can’t hold on much longer>> Nick thought as he felt the picture of Wyllt’s heart pulling him in. He tries his darndest to open his sketchbook to the picture of Wyllt’s heart. There he saw terrifying shadows standing around a coffin. The shadows didn’t care about the coffin as they started to reach for the gold above their heads.

“Old man, can you do me a favor and take me to place nice and quiet?” Nick asks as he closes the sketchbook, as well as his eyes. Soon after the man fainted.

“NICK!” Maya and Aya gasped. Maya ran over to Nick as Aya talked again to the old man.

“Hurry and get a wet towel. Or somebody to help him!”

“Maya...can you keep the sketch book safe for me?” Nick asks as Maya nods. “Thanks, Maya.”

Nick then fainted on top of the sketchbook. Maya and Aya were shocked to see that Nick had his eyes closed, with a bit of drool coming out of his mouth.

“Nick?” Maya asks with a worried look on her face. "Nick?! Nick?!?" Maya shoved him several times, but nothing happened. Wyllt then picked up Nick and put him on a nearby bench.

“I’ll go and get him some help,” he tells the girls as he leaves the group. Maya, Aya, and Saya just stood beside Nick, hoping for any kind of response from him.
1142312211211112111111221212.title: Finding the old man and fainting

choices: Something comes to help the sisters.
Switch to Nick in Myllt's heart.
11423122112111121111112212121.content:
The sisters stood there wondering what they could do. Nick was knocked out and it didn’t seem like that he was going to wake up. Maya was holding onto his sketchbook, holding it with a tight grip.

“Maya, is Nick going to be alright?” Saya asks the oldest sister.

Maya really didn’t know what to say. Nick had told Maya about that power he had. She figured/hoped he was inside somebody's heart right now solving their problem.

“Maya, can I see that sketch book?” Aya asks as she wonders if Nick’s fainting was from that power of his.

The oldest sister nods as she turns the sketchbook over to her. Aya slow opens the large sketchbook and looks through it. After a few pictures of fish, she saw a picture of shadows surrounding a coffin.

<<Is this really someone’s heart?>> Aya thought as she continues to examine the drawing. Maya looked over her sister's shoulder and saw the drawing, too. The oldest sister felt a bit scared after looking at it.

“I saw Nick draw that after we saw the old man,” Maya notes as she figured when he started to act strange.

“So it’s the old man who has the problem. He really should take care of own problem instead of ours.”

"I agree", Maya nods as she walks over to Nick. <<Nick, I wish I could help you..>>
11423122112111121111112212121.title: Talking about pictures

114231221121111211111122121211.content:
The sisters stood there wondering what to do, looking quite upset. Maya then saw something floating down from the sky. Aya and Saya also saw it, wondering what it was. They soon found out that it was a five inch tall woman with angel wings, now sitting on Nick's stomach. She looked to be about 19, with a small head of nut brown hair, average-sized breasts, and olive green eyes. She wore a white shirt with a brown jacket that was buttoned up, its sleeves rolled up to her elbows. Herer brown shorts reached a little bit over the knee, partially covering up her white socks and brown shoes. Soon after landing on Nick, she began to talk.

“I can’t believe this. How did we get back here? Oh well...looks like I’m going to help you again. Just like old times, huh Nick? Now where is that sketchbook?”

The sisters couldn’t believe what they were seeing. They were watching a small angel walk on top of the fainted Nick. Maya eventually broke the silent mood with a question.

“Um...are you Trucy?”

The small angel stopped looking for the sketchbook and gasped as she looked at the larger sisters.

“Y-yes. You can see me?”

The sisters replied with a nod as Trucy flew over to them and noticed the sketchbook.

“I see Nick made more friends. But it seems like two of you are a lot older then your heights tell.”

Maya and Aya were surprised that Trucy could tell that from just looking at them.

“How did you know that?” Aya asks her.

“Well, let’s just say I've had good interaction of these kinds of things. Now can you open that sketchbook and help out Nick, please?”

“I will on one condition", Aya says. "Could you somehow get me in there?"

Maya was shocked to hear Aya say that.

“I don’t know, but I can try”, Trucy replies. “But why would you want to come with me?” She looks at them with a confused expression.

“Nick helped us, so we want to help Nick,” Saya explains, the baby sister feeling safe talking with Trucy. The small angel saw Maya and Aya’s determination on their faces; they really wanted to help Nick.

“Fine. But can you at lest tell me your names?” Trucy sighs, but then smiles.

“Maya”, the eldest, half-size sister replies.

“Aya”, the younger, other half-size sister says.

“Saya,” the youngest replies with a blush on her face.

The quarter of girls saw some people from the aquarium applying First Aid. Some of the staff talked to the sisters as they picked Nick, asking if they would want to meet up with him later. They agreed, and soon Nick was in the hospital, the three sisters (and Trucy) by his side.

“Okay, Saya. Be a good girl as your older sisters help this idiot here,” Trucy giggles as Saya nods. Maya and Aya felt bad leaving Saya by herself. They then saw that the old man from earlier was waiting in the room as well.

“Sorry about that. My son is kind of useless. He was born with a weak body and every time he overexerts himself, this happens,” Wyllt explains to the nursing staff. Though it seemed to be an excuse moreso than a reason why a healthy guy like Nick would just suddenly faint. The nurse nodded as she put Nick on a bed.

“Would you three like to visit the aquarium while your Daddy gets better?” a nurse asks Maya.

“No, that’s alright. I want make sure that Dad is okay” Maya replies, feeling weird calling Nick her "father". The nurse nods as she got chairs for the sisters and Wyllt.

“Saya, take care of the sketchbook while we’re gone,” Aya whispered to her baby sister as she hands over the sketchbook to her, making sure it was open to the page with the drawing of Wyllt’s heart.

“Okay, you two. Since people think you two are kids, they'll just think you fell asleep waiting for your “Dad” to wake up,” Trucy says with a giggle as she thought it would be years before Nick would have kids.

“Okay, okay,” Aya whispers as Maya nods, ready to return the help that Nick gave her.

“Alright. Close your eyes and breathe in and out slowly,” Trucy explains as the two older sisters did what they were told.

The two sisters soon black out as they dream, feeling like they were being pushed underwater. The two woke up and saw that they were still half their size, as they noticed from some of the scenery was still pretty big to them even when sitting down. They were looking at huge shadows, which seemed to be trying to take the gold above them. They were on a long highway that stretched out as far as they could see. It looked normal enough, except for some odd colored backdrops, as well as some places floating in the sky.

“They don’t care about the person who died,” Aya frowns. Maya looks really upset, too.

“Well, it’s our job to fix that,” a voice from behind the sisters said. Maya and Aya turn around andsaw that Trucy was now much bigger.

“How did you grow?” Aya asks Trucy.

“I usually grow back to my normal size in these dreams. I'm about 5’8” in real life”, she replies.

Maya and Aya nod as they stood up.

“Nick’s not here,” Maya notes. “Why is that, Trucy?”

“I think Nick’s looking around. You're going to have to really look for him if you want to find out the problem.”

The sisters nod at the explanation.

“Let’s go find Bed Head,” Aya says as the group looks for Nick.
114231221121111211111122121211.title: Meeting Trucy the tiny angel

choices: Trucy, Maya, and Aya save Nick.
Nick falls down to the bottom floor.
1142312211211112111111221212112.content:
Meanwhile, Nick was wondering about the inside of Wyllt’s heart. It was a long time since he had entered a person's heart, and it felt strange to him.

“Now to find a clue or something that could help solve Wyllt’s problem.”

Nick has been looking around the place for something to aid him, but to no avail. Just when he thought he had looked everywhere, he saw a picture on the ground. It was a picture of a boy with blonde hair, and a younger Wyllt. Wyllt looked like he was in his 30's, so this picture must have been from long ago.

“Could this be the problem?” Nick asks as he picks up the photo. As he did, he saw in the sky a memory being played as if it was a video.

“Now now, son. It’s going to be alright,” a young Wyllt says as he puts on a bandage on the boy from the photo's knee.

“Thanks Daddy,” the boy says as he stops crying. The sky grew dark again afterwards, as the memory was now over.

Outside of his heart, Wyllt had this memory rushed into his mind. Saya saw that Wyllt looked confused.

“What’s wrong, Mister?” Saya asks as Wyllt replies,

“I just thought of something that I haven’t thought of for years.”

Inside Wyllt’s heart, Nick heard what Wyllt was saying on the outside.

“So this is something connected to his family,” Nick gathers as he looks for more photos. Since they were six giant shadows in his sketch, that meant Nick had five more memories to find.

Nick continues his journey, finding more "photos" along the way. Each one was a memory involving Wyllt and his kids, and he had already found five of them. In addition to the blonde boy, he also another blonde boy, a red-head girl, a blonde-haired girl, and a red-head boy.

“So I just need to find the final one and I'll be done,” Nick smiles as he soon finds the final picture. It was located across a broken tower. After a long climb up it, Nick went over to the edge of the top of the tower and slowly reaches for the picture. As he didn't want to fall to this death, he was very careful in reaching over to it. Nick did eventually get the picture...but he also lost his footing and fell down the hole below him.

“Crap! I can’t die here!” he yelled as he fell with the picture in his hand.
1142312211211112111111221212112.title: Nick and the pictures

choices: Nick figures out a way to solve Wyllt's problem.
The world of Wyllt's heart starts to crumble.
11423122112111121111112212121121.content:
Nick was ready for the impact of the ground, shutting his eyes as he expected to die upon landing. But as he fell, he notices something; he was still in mid-air. The tower wasn't this big, so Nick didn’t understand what was going on. That is, until he looks behind himself and saw the half-sized Maya holding his hand.

“Maya! What are you doing here!?’

“She’s not the only one here,” Aya adds as she was trying to help Maya pull Nick back up. Even together the half-size sisters struggled, so Trucy left them a third hand and manged to pull him in. Afterwards, the three rested on the ground.

“Trucy, you're back!" Nick gasps. "But why are Maya and Aya doing here?” He really wanted to know why a girl who died three years ago was back and seemed to age, much less why she was with the half-size sisters.

“Sorry, Nick. I came back when you got your power back. And those half-size sweeties wanted to come in here to help you”, Trucy explains as Nick looks at Maya and Aya.

“Thanks guys. I really owe you one", he tells the girls, who blush.

“It’s no problem,” Maya says for the two.

The last memory ten appeared in the sky. Before it plays, Nick looks at the girls.

“Have you seen these?”

“Of course. It’s kind of hard to not see them in the sky,” Aya talks for the girls.

Nick nods as he looks up to watch the memory. The memory had a orange haired young boy of ten, and a really young version of Wyllt, who looked no older than his late 20's.

“Dad, do you mind if I follow in your foot steps?” the boy asks as Wyllt had a smile on his face.

“Of course, my boy. You can do whatever you want,” Wyllt says with a smile as he picks up his son and gives him a piggy back ride.

The memory ended and suddenly a new memory comes up. There stood the six children from the earlier memories, now adults.

“Father is getting older. Since Mom passed away, he seems more depressed”, the blonde-haired man said.

“We need to think of plan to split the accesses”, a red-haired woman adds. As the adults kept talking, the sky went totally black.

“Was that Wyllt’s last memory of his children?’ Aya asks Trucy.

“It seems to be that way. Looks like the children were discussing what they would do after their father passed away.”

Maya knew that Wyllt must of felt like his children didn’t want him around anymore.

“But that’s not true. Wyllt seemed to love his children! From all of the memories we seen, they truly loved their father”! Maya says, Nick nodding in agreement.
___

Wyllt sat there in silence as he had this rush of memories coming back into his head.

<<Why am I thinking of those things? My kids only care about that they get after I die>> Wyllt thought as Saya continued to look after him.
11423122112111121111112212121121.title: Both Nick and the memory are saved

choices: Trucy hangs out with the sisters to learn more about them as Nick cooks.
The sisters want to hear more stories about Nick.
114231221121111211111122121211211.content:
Nick saw that Wyllt was hurting really bad, thinking of a way to solve the problem. Then it hit him; he already had the tools to fix Wyllt’s problem.
