“I solved it. Let’s go see those shadows!” Nick shouts as he starts to run back to where he first dove into his heart. Trcuy and the sisters chase after him.

“Nick what are you planning?!” Aya yells to get Nick, hopping to get to hear his plan.

“You’ll see”, Nick says as Aya only sighs.

“Do you think he can solve this problem?” a concerned Maya asks Trucy.

“Yes", she replied with a bit of hesitance. “He's solved problems on his own as well before. I think this might be one of those times. Besides, no matter what I said, you would still believe in him, right?”

Maya nods with a smile. Maya believed that he could fix the problem in Wyllt’s heart. The group soon made it to where they all first landed. The shadows were still fighting over the gold as Nick went up to them.

<<Okay. Time to do this>> Nick thought as he took out a pitcure of one of the children and placed it on the face of a shadow. The shadow’s face soon turns into an adult version of the blonde-haired boy from the first memory. He stops reaching for the gold above him and instead looks at the coffin below him. The blonde-haired man then started to cry.

“The shadows are his kids. So putting on the pictures on the shadows will turn them into there true faces,” Maya gathers as she watches Nick continue to make more shadows into the adult versions of Wyllt’s children.

“It seems to be working,” Aya adds, watching the gold above them disappear.

Trucy was proud to see that Nick to solve this problem. After Nick was finishing turning the shadows into the adult versions of the kids, a memory appeared in the sky.

“Dad, we’re just worried about you. We don’t want you to alone any more”, a red-head woman says to him.

“Come on Dad. Let us take care of you”, the orange-haired man adds.

__

On the outside, Wyllt was tearing up. He remembered how much of a pain he was to his kids.They tried to help him when he was sad and alone, but he thought they were only after his money. Suddenly Nick pops right back up from the bed, blinking as he stood up. Maya and Aya open their eyes as Trucy came out of the sketchbook and landed near Nick.

“I’m out,” Nick says with a bit of sweat coming down his brow. Wyllt looked at Nick, Maya and Aya, knowing that they helped him from within his heart.

“Thank you. Are sure your going to be alright?” Wyllt asks as Nick. He felt a bit stiff, but soon manages to walk around a bit. It was then that he saw Trucy was sitting on his shoulder.

“Yeah. I’m going to be fine. Thanks for looking after Maya and her sisters,” Nick says with a smile. Wyllt nods.

”Maya, Aya...when you grow back to normal size, I’ll give you something really good.”

Wyllt then leaves without another word. Saya waves him good-bye as she soon turns her attention to Nick, who was holding out his hands.

“Saya, can I have my sketchbook back?” he asks the littlest sister. She nods as she does so. After

Saya nods with a smile as she gives the sketch book back. After getting the sketch book back, Saya hugs Nick.

“I’m glad you're all back,” Saya says as she walks up to hug her sisters next.

“Looks like somebody became a ladies' man,” Trucy said as she sat on his shoulder. Nick sighed as he looks at the shrunken angel.

“Very funny. So I guess your back to stay for a bit?”

“Yep. Looks like you got your power back as well. You'll be either helping people, or you'll rot”, she says in a harsh though also playful tone. Nick only sighed.

“Since you're back up, can we continue to look at the aquarium?” Maya asks as she still saw Trucy.

“Of course, Saya. We still have plenty of time.”

“I figure you’ll tell me everything about what happen to you two when we get to your house?” Trucy asks the older sisters. Maya and Aya nod.

As they talked, a doctor came in the room. He held up a folder in his right armpit, and had short, black hair and blue eyes. He was fairly tall and a bit lanky.

“Sir, we’ll let you and your kids continue your tour of the aquarium, but you must have a assistant with you,” the doctor explains.

“Hello, dear,” the clerk lady from earlier says as she comes thought the door.

“Um. I think I’ll be fine by myself.”

“Nope. You must do it, or you'll stay here for the next 22 hours”, the doctor replies.

Nick agrees to the extra assistance as they all head back to the aquarium. Maya, Aya, and Trucy enjoy looking at the exhibits and sights, while the clerk tried to hit on Nick as he drew. Fortunately, Maya was there to get her from doing so. Trucy giggles as she watches from the sidelines, enjoying her aquarium trip as well.

After the aquarium closed, they came back home, where...
114231221121111211111122121211211.title: Solving Wyllt's problem and getting the power back

choices: Maya breaks free and runs up to her room.
Maya confesses that she really likes Nick.
1142312211211112111111221212112111.content:
The content, nut brown-haired angel sat on the kitchen table with Maya, Aya, and Saya as Nick cooked them all dinner.

"So you're the three girls Nick's been helping out, huh? May I ask some things about you three, if you don't mind?" Trucy asks.

"Not at all. Feel free to ask us anything you want, Trucy", Maya replies.

"Well, I already know your names, but I'd like to know about each of you personally. If you're cool with that."

"I'm Saya. I like flowers, cats, taking walks, playing games, and being with my big sisters", the baby of the family chimes first.

"Well..I'm Aya. I like to study, learn new languages, explore, and also like to hang out with my sisters", the middle sister follows.

"And I'm Maya. I like poetry, writing, reading romance books, and being with my family, too. I work part-time as a waitress", the oldest sister finishes.

"I see. You three are pretty close", Trucy says as she stands up. "Well I think you already know, but Nick and I were once really good friends. I still like him, but don't worry Maya; I won't take him from you."

"W-What are you talking about?" Maya blushes. "I don't see him as my b-boyfriend.."

"Yes you two!" Trucy teases her.

"Well, okay, I do kind of admit it.." Maya smiles. "I do really, really like him."

"Me too!" Saya nods.

"He's not so bad, I suppose", Aya adds. "He's the first guy I ever met who likes my brains instead of my..well.." Aya points at her rather nice body for a teenager.

Trucy nods in agreement as she looks at Maya and Aya. "It's strange how you two are so small, though. You seem perfectly content to me."

"Maybe Maya should confess she likes Nick", Says suggests as Maya blushes. "Maybe that will make her big again."

"Yeah! Go for it, sis!" Aya pushes her.

"Waaah! You too, Aya?!" Maya shrieks. "I'm too shy!!"

"Go for it, big sister!" Saya cheers, holding her hand and leading her off the table. "Nick, Maya has something to say to you!"

"Saya!!" Maya still whimpered loudly. "Stop!"
1142312211211112111111221212112111.title: Trucy learns more

choices: Nick wakes up and notices something has changed.
Maya and Trucy and were still talking upstairs.
11423122112111121111112212121121111.content:
After much struggle, Maya broke free from Saya’s grip as Nick turns around to talk to her. Maya blushes as she runs out of the kitchen.

“I’ll be in my room for a bit. I’ll right back,” she tells everyone as she excuses herself.

“Alright,” Nick says as he thought that Maya had to do something. Saya and Aya sighed as Trucy shook her head.

“We’ll be back. We just need to get Maya back,” Aya says as the half-size sister and Saya ran after their half-sized older sister. Trucy followed the sisters, hoping to get Maya down for dinner at least.

Nick smiles as watches the girls run up the stairs. It soon fades as he looks at his sketchbook, looking at the new drawing of Wyllt’s heart. There stood a smiling Wyllt with his kids and grandkids. Nick pulls the soup off the stove and pours it in the bowls for all five of them. When he was done, he took his seat as he got out some color Copic markers and started to color the drawings of the sisters he drew from earlier. As he colors them in, Nick begins to think.

<<When I got this power the first time, Trucy wanted me to be able to make friends, since I was a dark person according to her. But why do I have these powers again? Why in the world would I get them back? Why is Trucy back? There’s got to be a reason behind this. And I’ll figure it out once Maya and Aya return to normal size. I hope that my arm doesn’t start rotting..”

Nick stops thinking and shivers at the thought of seeing his body rotting. After that unpleasant thought, he looks down and sees that he's done the first coat of the coloring for the sisters’ pictures; the young man put it on in a safe place so it could dry faster. Nick then saw that the girls were back from downstairs. Maya’s face was a bit red for some reason...and Aya and Saya puffed as it seemed like they were talking a while as Trucy floated and lands on the table.

“Nick...thanks for cooking for us,” Maya says with a smile as she digs in. The two younger sisters sigh as Trucy giggles at the oldest sister's inability to get her feelings across. She remembers that Nick only found out Trucy loved him after she died, so he hoped he would noticeably faster with her.

“You're welcome,” Nick replies as he eats, continuing to wonder why he has his powers back. After the group ate their dinner, it was time for bed.

“I think I’ll be sleeping near Maya,” Trucy says with a smile as the small angel sat on Maya’s shoulder. Maya smiles at the small angel wanting to talk more to her.

“Night, Nick,” Saya says as she goes back to her bed room. Aya waves to him as well as she goes upstairs.

“Night, Nick. Sweet dreams,” Maya and Trucy say at the same time as they go upstairs as well.

“Night, girls,” Nick says to all four of them before he soon crashes on the couch, wondering what will happen tomorrow.
11423122112111121111112212121121111.title: Running away and the deep thought on power

choices: There's a chance for Maya and Aya to grow back to their normal size.
Wyllt came to give his presents to the sisters for shrinking them.
114231221121111211111122121211211111.content:
Nick was the first up. Unlike yesterday, this time he KNEW he was in the sister's house. He picked up his new clothes and went straight for the shower. Nick was washing his hair when he feels something strange coming down from his head/

<<What the heck is that?!>> Nick thought as he open his eyes and looks in a mirror. He notice that black ink seemed to be mixed in with the water! Nick was shock to see Ink on his hair, looking at his hands he saw that his indexed figure’s tip become a brush that was tipped with black ink.

<<What the hell!?!>> Nick though again as he shook his head and saw that his figure tip was back to normal. Nick cleans off the black ink and quickly finishes his shower. He then put on a blue and white striped shirt and a pair of shorts. Nick then went to the kitchen to fix breakfast for everyone.

“Morning Nick,” Maya says as she comes down the stairs first. She seemed to just gotten out of the shower, as her hair was still wet. The half-sized half was wearing a white shirt with red hearts on it, as well as a black skirt. Trucy the brown-haired angel wasn't behind, resting on her shoulder.

“Morning, Maya and Trucy,” Nick says as he finishes a batch of scrambled eggs.

“Thanks for cooking for us, Nick.” Maya says with a cheerful, thankful tone.

“You used to be so useless. When did you become so dependable?” Trucy teases Nick. Nick had somewhat of an annoyed look on his face.

“I have always been dependable.”

Maya and Trucy giggle at the sight of his face. Aya and Saya soon came down the stairs as well. Aya was wearing a black shirt with a cartoon fish on it, and blue pants. Saya had pajamas that had cat heads on them, the girl still looking half-sleep.

“Saya, could you at lest get dressed first?” Aya asks her baby sister as she ate her breakfast.

“After breakfast,” Saya says as she sits down and eats her scrambled eggs. Maya nods as she starts to eat as well. Nick also eats as Trucy watches the group.

“Trucy, would you like some food?” Maya asks the small angel.

“I really don’t need to eat. But thanks for asking me anyway.”

Saya saw that the flowers in a vase, which the baby sister collected weeks ago, were now fading away. The flowers used to bright yellow with fluffy buds. Now, thought, they seem to be dark and withering.

“Can we go on a walk today and pick more flowers?” Saya asks, pointing to the wilting flowers.

“Sure we can. It’s nice out and we need to go out more,” Maya replies, Nick nodding in agreement.

“Okay, let’s go upstairs and pick out something cute for you to wear,” Aya tells her sister as she finishes her breakfast. Saya soon finishes hers as well and follows her. Maya was also done eating and was putting the plates together with Nick so they could be washed. Trucy watches as Aya takes Saya upstairs to get the baby sister dress for the walk.

“Come on Maya, let’s help Saya get dressed!” Aya yells from the top of the steps.

“But I don’t want Nick to do all the work!” Maya yells back.

“It’s fine, Maya. Go help Saya pick an outfit. I’ll clean up,” Nick tells her, rubbing her head.

"But..."

“It’s no problem", Trucy replies. "Let Nick handle things.” The small angel then grabs the tiny woman's hand and pulls her up the stairs. Nick waves at Maya as she waves back.

Nick soon began cleaning the table, as well as the dishes and pans, as he got ready for the walk. He got his pencils, markers, and sketchbook - everything he needed to draw anything on the walk. He put his stuff in the blue bag and places it on his right shoulder. He then sat on a chair in the kitchen as he waits for the sisters to come down. Nick saw the dead flowers in the vase. As he did, something in Nick’s head told him to look at his indexed fingers. Both fingers had brush tips with black ink on them..

<<This again? Wait, maybe I’ll try to redraw the flower>> Nick thought as he uses his right index finger as he would use a regular pen as he drew a black ink version of said flower. Suddenly after the flower comes back to life. It even had the bright yellow color and fluffy buds back!

“Did that happen with this?! I didn’t have this power like this when I went into people’s hearts. Is this a bad mutation?”

Nick continues to think until the half-sized Maya snaps him out of it.

“Nick! Before we go, I’ll be making our lunches.”

Nick looks behind him and saw the girls right in front of him. Saya was now wearing new clothes: her trademark red ribbon in her hair, a rainbow color sundress, and brown shoes for her feet. Nick re-looks at his fingers, which looked normal again.

“Maya! I ca-“

“Don’t worry about it, Nick. I’ll fix lunch. Just go and relax in the living room,” Maya interrupts the young man. Nick saw that he wouldn’t be winning this fight and followed Maya’s orders. Aya and Saya help Maya fix the lunch as Trucy watches the sisters make sandwiches.

__

Nick began to experiment with his index finger brushes. Nick was able to turn on and off this power apparently; and if he made a slash with them on, it could cut something in half, as he learned when he sliced in half a broken pencil. He turned the power off as soon as he saw the sisters comes out of the kitchen.

“Let’s go for that walk,” Maya cheerfully says as Nick gets up. Trucy then lands on Nick’s shoulder as he let the sisters out first. He then locked the door behind them. Now that they were all standing up again, Nick was still amazed that Maya and Aya were still half their size. Maybe that would change today.
114231221121111211111122121211211111.title: Breakfast and a walk

1142312211211112111111221212112111111.content:
It was nice to have a walk with the sisters and Trucy, according to Nick. As they walked, Nick somehow manages to find the time to also draw the things around him. He smiles as he looks at the clear sky and fast moving. To Nick, this was paradise.

“Does he always have that look on his face when he draws?” Maya asks as Trucy had moved to the haft sized oldest sister’s shoulder.

“Yes. He even makes up songs,” Trucy sighs as he starts singing to himself.

“Peaceful water, peaceful water...”

Aya couldn’t believe that a grown made was singing about a river.

“Peaceful water, Peaceful water”, Saya sings along with Nick as she approaches him. Maya giggles at the sight as Aya couldn’t believe the baby sister had joined with the signing.

“It’s like hanging out with him again”, Trucy chirps as the small angel thought about the times Nick just drew and she bugged him. She then starts to reminisce in her mind about her youth.

“Do you think we can solve a problem of ours and grow back to our normal size in this place?” Aya, in a whisper, asks Maya.

“I hope so. But it’s nice to have a lunch near the river bank”, Maya beams in reply, showing the lunches she had more in her basket.

As Maya set up the lunches, Saya picked flowers, while Nick drew some more. It was nearly noon by the time they ate.

“Time for lunch, everybody!” Maya calls out with a smile.

Nick gets out a blanket and lays on the ground for them to eat on top of.

“Here! We brought some home-made sandwiches, drinks, and desserts for everybody”, Aya explains as they sat down the food.

Saya picked what she wanted to eat and starts to dig in. Nick picked up a sandwich and took a bite.

“This tastes great. You’re good cooks”, Nick compliments the sisters. Maya blushes, Aya nods with a smirk on her face, and Saya smiles brightly.

“So now that we're eating, would anyone like to talk about anything?” Trucy asks, wanting to help the other two sisters grow back to normal.

11423122112111121111112212121121111112.content:
Trucy hoped for a chance for the sisters to grow back to normal until Nick saw something in the distance. A strawberry-blond haired woman was on the ground, apparently fallen out of a wheelchair that was near her.

“Miss, are you alright?” Nick says as he gets up and helps the woman. The woman was about 35. Along with aforementioned starwberry blonde hair, she had blue eyes and a hospital patient uniform on.

“I’m fine. Thank you every much, son,” the woman smiles as Nick helps her up back on the wheelchair.

“I’m Nick, and these three are sisters that I’m babysitting,” Nick introduces himself. The three girls then introduce themselves as well.

<<Looks like the younger sister is teller then the older ones. Odd.>> “My name is Zoe”, the older woman says as Trucy bows to her, feeling the need to be polite to an older woman.

“Why are you here, Zoe? Shouldn't you be inside?” Saya asks, getting better with talking with new people.

“Well, little girl, it's the day I go out for fresh air”, Zoe explains. “It’s my walking time from the hospital.”

“Wow, she most be really sick if she has to be at the hospital,” Trucy says on Aya's shoulder, her nodding in agreement.

“Well, we were about to have a picnic. Care to join us?” Maya offers her.

Zoe was about to reply when a nurse from the hospital came by. She did not seem happy, either.

“Miss Zoe, you know that your not allowed to be this far!” the nurse scolds her as she takes her away from the girls and Nick. Before she leaves, she bows at the girls. “Thank you for looking after her.”

“Next time, my dear. Thank you again,” Zoe says with a smile as the nurse rolls Zoe away.

“Looks like you four made a new friend,” Trucy says as Nick seese a deep aura surrounding Zoe. Nick turns the next page of his sketchbook and starts to draw Zoe’s heart. When he finished, there was a smile child crying in the middle of the page, darkness sounding her.

“Looks like we have another one,” Nick notes as he cracks his knuckles.

“So soon, too. So when are Maya, Aya and, me going to dive in with you?” Trucy asks with a smile.

“I think I can handle this myself,” Nick replies. Trucy's expression slowly went from a smile to a giant frown.

“Nick, you have to let us help you!” Maya asks. “I don't want you to have to travel alone..”

“That’s right, Nick. With us around, it can really help you,” Aya agrees.

“I SAID I can do this myself!!” Nick repeats himself, hitting a tree with his fist.

After that tree hitting, there was an awkward silence. Nick then gave everyone a cold, dark glare like the sisters and even Trucy never saw before. Saya and Maya were too scared to reply, and Aya was too pissed off at him to say anything. It was up to Trucy to be the voice for all four of them.

“Stupid Nick! Why are you being so annoying now?!” Trucy shouts as the giant young man.

“'Stupid!'?! You’re the one that’s stupid! You're always getting into other people's business, even when you're not wanted!”

Trucy couldn’t believe what Nick said to her. Saya was kind of scared at the idea of Nick and Trucy fighting. Aya wonders what to do as she hadn't really seen this side of Nick or Trucy before.

“Please calm down, you two!” Maya cries. “I don't like fighting!”
11423122112111121111112212121121111112.title: New heart problem

“She's right, Nick. We have to calm down.” Trucy says as an agitated Nick looks at her in frustration.

“Shut it. You’re just a pest, Trucy! Just go away!!"

Trucy began to tear up at Nick yelling at her.

“Fine! I’ll go away! Amd don’t expect me to come back ever again! See you!”

Trucy flew away with tears coming down her face.

“Nick, you went too far!” Maya yells as she ran after Trucy. She couldn’t believe Nick yelled at the small angel. Aya shook her head at Nick as followed her sister. Saya stood there wondering what was wrong with Nick, but soon left to follow her sisters as well. She felt that Nick needed to be alone. Nick was left alone to think about what he said to Trucy.

<<I’ll say I’m sorry after I fix Zoe’s heart>> Nick thought as the young man went over to the hospital to help fix Zoe’s heart.

choices: Trucy, Maya, Aya, and Saya come back to see Nick calm down.
Trucy and the sisters were at home.
1142312211211112111111221212112111111221.content:
Nick had made it all the way to the hospital. Nick had to tell the check in clerk that he was alright and that he was visiting Zoe. Nick soon was in the same room as the blond strawberry women.

“It’s nice to meet you again. Where are those sisters you were babysitting?” Zoe asks with a bit of sweetness in her voice.

“Their mother picked theme up. I came here for a quick visit.”

“Oh is that so?” Zoe asks as she sees the nurse comes in.

“Sir, could you please go out for a few minutes? Zoe needs to take a nap”, she tells Nick.

“Please come back when my nap’s done,” Zoe requests of Nick. She then grumbles a bit at the nurse.

“Okay. I’ll be in the waiting room,” Nick says as he leaves the room.

Nick went to the waiting room as he said. As he sis, he was getting to dive into her heart. Since his body became stiff, he put the sketchbook in front of his face so passersby would just think he was looking at a picture. He soon dives into it.
__

Nick was standing in a park, looking for a little crying girl.

<<I wonder she is?>> Nick thought as he then saw a little girl crying. He walks over and listens to what she has to say. The little girl turns out to be Zoe.

“It’s my fault. It’s my fault. It’s happening because of me,” she cries.

Nick couldn’t understand what the young Zoe was crying about. He decided it would be best to look around. He then saw two giants in the middle of the two of them. One giant was an adult man with blond hair and wore a suit, and the other was a women with red hair and wore a pink dress with black high heels.

<<Are those her parents?>> Nick thought to himself. He then looked and Zoe and asks her this.

“It’s my fault. They don’t love each other. They don’t even live together anymore,” she explains.

Nick was shocked that Zoe still blamed herself for her parents’ separation. He had to find a way to fix this problem. Nick notices that there was a piece of paper on the ground. He decides to pick it up.

“Zoe, what’s this doing here?”

“I drew that, but that wouldn’t solve anything. I can’t do anything to help them. It’s my fault.”

Nick then brought his index figure out and turns the tip of his finger into a brush tip with black ink. He starts to fix the picture as he begins to see a picture colored with crayons. It was the young Zoe in the middle of a picture, with her father on her right and her mother on the left.

“Zoe, your parents need to see this”, Nick tells the crying girl.

Zoe shook her head. “They’re to busy fighting to notice me.”

Nick sighs as he looked upward again at the two giants. Afterward he got an idea of to get them to see the picture. He decided to pelt them with rocks to get their attention. Although he was hesintatn of the consequences, they got results; the giant parents looked down and saw Zoe crying. Both parents lie down on the ground to see her better.

“Zoe you have to show them the drawing you drew. Come on show them and they’ll listen to you because they love you,” Nick says to her.

Nick put the picture in Zoe’s hands as Zoe stops crying for a moment. She nods as she raises the picture and shows it to her parents. The giant parents saw this and had a sad look on their faces. They then lit up a bit as they patted their child's head. Zoe stops crying and begins to smile instead.
__

Nick woke up. He was sweating a bit, but he had solved Zoe’s problem. Nick looked at the clock and saw that it p.m. now. Nick went over to Zoe's room and saw that she was awake. Zoe was smiling with tears coming down her face.

“Zoe, are you all right?” Nick asks as he has a strange felling about this. This was quite different than when solved a person’s problem typically.

Zoe turns her head to see Nick standing in the door way. “I had a dream where I figured out that my parents sill loved me when they separated. And you were there to help me out. Thank you. At lest I can apologize to my parents before I pass on.”

“No, it was- Wait! When you pass on!?” Nick gasps, looking devastated.

“Yes. I’m dying right now. And I have a feeling that you helped me out a bit. So thank you.”

“But you’re dying. I can’t even save you,” Nick barely musters as he cries.

“But you did. You made sure that I can say my goodbye to my parents and apologize at how rotten of a kid I was. But Nick, you're still young, so learn from your mistakes. Be happy, be sad, cry when you can’t hold it in any more. Keep those you cherish close to you and cherish those memories.” Zoe smiles as Nick began to draw in his sketchbook.

“You know I have a power that can draw a person's heart,” Nick says as he finishes and hands it over to Zoe. Zoe looks at and saw that it was a replica of what she drew as a kid.

“Thank you, Nick. For everything,” Zoe says as she hugs Nick. Nick hugs back as Zoe let go. Visiting hours were over as Nick left the hospital. He stood at the same river

“Drawing always helps me…” Nick says as he tries to draw. But instead of a drawing, tears were found on his sketchbook. Nick cries so much from the anguish from earlier, snot started running down his nose.

”I’m such an idiot. I made Trucy cry, and Maya, Aya, and Saya hate me. Zoe is also going to die and I couldn’t do anything to save her. I'm a weak, pathetic jack-assjust a jack ass and I’m still weak,” Nick laments as he set his sketchbook on the ground and let out a good cry.

__

It was around 6 p.m. now. Nick was still sitting still, with his eyes puffy and red and his snot hardened. He just sat still, thinking about what do.
1142312211211112111111221212112111111221.title: Hard but simple lesson in life

After Nick had yelled at her, Trucy flew away until she was thought she was far away enough from Nick. Trucy then sat down on a rock.

“Nick’s just a jerk,” Trucy thought as the angle crosses her arms. The sisters were finally caught up with the little angel.

“Trucy, are you going to be okay?” Maya asks worried about the smaller women. Trucy smiles at the haft sized Maya.

“Yes. Thank you for coming after me,”

“He’s really being an idiot. If I was my normal size I would have pop him one,” Aya says with lifting her fist up.

“We’ll have fun without him. It’s going to be a girl’s day out,” Trucy says with a smile. The sisters nod and soon the four girls had fun for the entire day. Going shopping, playing games and watching a movie.

__

The group was walking back to the river bank to get back their things. It was around six pm. Trucy was still thinking about what Nick did.

“Sure he was kind of dark when we were in high school. But the only think he would do was complaining. Did he get much angrier? “

Maya saw that Trucy in deep thought.

“Are you thinking about Nick?”

Trucy sighs as she couldn’t really hide what she was thinking.

“Well yes. I am kind of worried about him,”

“Who cares? He acted like an idiot,” Aya says still angry at Nick for what he said and his actions.

“Maybe he calm down a bit,” Saya says as she wanted to know what was wrong if Nick. Maya sighs as she was wondering what was wrong with the young man as well.

“He might still be back where we set but the picnic. So we’ll talk to him then,” Maya explains as Aya wanted to argue but the middle sister wanted to know what’s going on with Nick as well.



The group walks to the river bank and saw the young man sitting still. Trucy notes that the sketch that he was drawing in was now next him. Trucy flew off Maya’s should and was about a foot away from Nick.

“Nick are you alright?” Trucy asks as Nick replies with out turning around.

“Trucy… I’m sorry for what I did earlier. I’m just an idiot,”

Nick words sound heart broken. Maya went over and stood besides Trucy. Aya followed to make sure that Nick didn’t try anything funny. Saya followed Aya so she could hear what the group was saying.

“Nick, did something happen when you help Zoe? Maya ask as she saw Nick head straiten up.

“Maya. I’m sorry as well. Zoe was happy,”

Aya was confused at Nick was trying to say. It seems like he help Zoe but something wrong.

“What happen to Zoe?” Aya asks as Nick says.

“She passed away today,”

The girls were surprised to hear that the kind older women they meet earlier died today. Saya was saddened by the news as she begins to tear up a bit. Aya hugs the baby sister to help her calm her down.

“Did she die from her problem?” Trucy asks in calm smoothing voice.

“No. She was dieing already. I solved her problem but I could help her live. Here I thought this little new power of mine would help. But in the end I couldn’t do anything,” Nick says as Trucy wonder what he was talking about.

“What new power Nick?” Maya asks as she got closer to the young man. Trucy got on Maya’s shoulder to see what Nick was talking about.

Aya didn’t want her sister to go near the young man but felt like it was best that the older sister went over as Aya was still comforting Saya.

Maya and Trucy saw Nick’s face as it seemed like he has been crying for hours. The also notice that his index finger’s tip was a brush with black on it.

“Nick when did this happen?” Tucy asks as leaps off Maya’s shoulder and examines the finger.

“This morning, I don’t know it happen. I just woke up with it on my finger,” Nick explains as Maya was still looking the brush finger tip.

“How was Zoe after you fixed her problem?” Maya asks as Nick says.

“She said she was happy. Zoe said she could apologize to her parents,” Nick explains still a bit sadden.

“But she was happy before she passed on. You made death easier on her,” Trucy explains as Maya says.

“Yes. You made her happy before she died. And we’ll help you get use to this power.”

Maya hugs Nick as Trucy hugs Nick’s hand. Nick felt a little lighter for some odd reason. Unkown to everyone a little shadow come out of Nick and went into the air.

“Thanks you two. Your really are looking out for me. So I’m sorry,” Nick says with a bit of a smile.

Trucy and Maya smiled as Aya and Saya were happy that Nick was back to normal.

Maya diced that she would cook breakfast that morning as she was back to normal size. Maya hums a song as she made blue berry pancakes, scramble eggs and a bit of bacon. Soon the group was eating, Trucy was eating a bit as well.

“I don’t know. I feel kind of hungry,” Trucy blushes as she ate a piece of bacon.

She had long red hair, brown eyes, and wore a black shirt under a red sweater, black jeans, and blue shoes. Wren was taller then Aya but had bit of a smaller chest.

From what Aya told her about her friends, Meinir was a very nice girl that kept group of three level headed and Wren was strongest girl in school. Both of them are fifteen, the same age as Aya.

When Meinir and Wren come into the kitchen they saw a strange sight. The baby sister, a young man and their haft sized friend eating breakfast.

Aya couldn’t believe that her friends were more surprised at seeing her getting along with the opposite sex. Trucy giggle a bit from the new girls. Nick held in his laugh as Saya was laughing at Aya’s action

Nick was confused by the question.

“Yes, but don’t worry. I won’t be taking him away from your sister.”

Saya forecasts a smile as she went upstairs to see what Maya would be wearing. Aya, meanwhile, sighs. It seemed that the once tallest sister (despite being the middle sister) was the smallest sister again. After she sighed, she went upstairs as well, with Nick and Trucy smiling at the sight. Soon after, dinner was made.

“Dinner’s ready,” Nick says as he gets the food of the stove. Tonight he had made some soup.

“That’s great. Say Nick, did you draw Wyllt's heart again after you fixed his problem?” Trucy asks him.

Nick nods; he always drew the person’s heart again and sees its happy side. The sketchbook from that day was on the kitchen table. He made a gesture for Trucy to look at it herself, which she helped herself to. The new picture of Wyllt’s heart. It was a picture of him smiling, his kids and grand-kids surrounding him all around.

“So that’s what a heart looks like after you fix it,” a voice said from behind. Nick and Trucy saw that it was Maya. She was now wearing a white shirt and a black skirt. Aya and Saya were close behind.

“Yep. It was thanks to you we got this drawing. Thanks again, Maya and Aya,” Nick says as they flash him a smile.

“It would be bad if my sister’s boyfriend had died,” Aya says as they all sat down for dinner. Nick sighed, but with a smile on his face; Maya smiled as well.

The dinner meal was a short one, since it was only soup. Still, it allowed everyone to reflect on everything that had happen today, which was quite a lot: a trip to the aquarium, an old man's heart fixed, Maya growing to normal size and gaining a boyfriend. It was the most excitement for Maya and her sisters in a long time. After they ate, it was time for bed.

“Goodnight everybody,” Nick says as he starts cleaning up. Trucy stays with him on his shoulder.

“Okay. Night, Nick,” Saya says as she hugs him and goes up to her room.

“Night, Bed Head,” Aya says in a joking tone as she went to her room.

Maya, meanwhile, stays in the kitchen to help Nick with the dishes. After they were done, then they finally went up to bed.

“I think I’ll be sleeping near Maya,” Trucy says with a smile as she floats down to Maya’s shoulder.

“Nite, Nick,” Maya says as she gives him a quick peck on the lips. She then went up to her room as Trucy and Maya start to talk on the walk up the stairs. Nick hoped that Trucy wouldn’t say anything about what he was like in in school...

Now alone, Nick then went to sleep on the couch. Having gained both his power back and a girlfriend; it was a long day for the young man. As he drifted to sleep, he smiles as he thinks about what happened today. The next morning would be a interesting one.

"Aya!" Saya cried as she picked her shrunken sister and hugged her. Aya could barely breathe as she felt Saya's tight grip.

"Saya, please be easy on me!" Aya pleaded.

"I'm sorry..", Saya replied as she loosened her grip and looked down at Aya. "What do we do now?"

Aya wondered that herself. She was certain it had something to do with the perfume spray, which came from Maya. And Maya herself got it from work.

"Let's go home. Let's get Maya to help me."

Saya nodded as she starts to walk home. Aya quickly notices her little sister was scared. She also hoped nothing bad would befall them on their way back.
1511122.title: Meet the middle sister doll

1533321.content:
Aya and Saya both looked down at the bottle of perfume with much curiosity, not knowing what sort of perfume it was or where it came from. Should they have been snooping around Maya's room, probably not, thought Aya, but being a teenager, she had made it her business to know what this was her sister brought home. Saya just wanted to tag along with her older sister, she did not care about the perfume itself as much.

Wonder what it smells like?" said Aya looking towards her sister.

"Lets find out!" squealed Saya with delight.

As Aya sprayed it, them both stepped forward and inhaled deeply, getting the scent of strawberries stuck in their noses. However, both started to feel strange as the scent left them, the dresser the bottle was on started to get larger! Aya looked at her sister and Saya back at her, both noticed that their clothes getting baggy on them. Saya had fear all over her face, not knowing what was going on, Aya saw this and tried to comfort her younger sister. The process kicked into its last leg though, making it seem like to both that they were falling from a cliff as they fell into their clothes piles.

Aya, climbed out of her shirt and rushed to the other pile and started looking through until she uncovered a scared and crying Saya.

"Shhhh, it will all be okay" she whispered to her, unsure of her own words. Once calmed down, they both toke in their predicament. They were about the sizes of dolls, with Saya being slightly shorter than Aya, and they both were naked due to their clothes not shrinking with them.

Aya, being the older sibling had to make a choice.

info.brief_description: A trio of sisters start changing when their oldest sister comes home from work one day.
info.description:
18 year-old Maya comes home from work one day from her job as a waitress exhausted and tired, heading back to the house she takes care of while her parents are away during long periods of work. What she doesn't know, though, is that she is also carrying in her purse a little bottle of perfume given to her by one of the people she waited on. She was told that whoever smells it would change before their eyes. Maya, not believing in that sort of stuff, leaves it on the top of her bureau in her bedroom. Will Maya eventually check it out again, or will one of her little sisters stumble onto it instead?

Bios of the three sisters:

Name: Maya
Age: 18
Height: 4'11"
Hair color/length: Short, brown
Eye color: Brown
Description: A short, slight clumsy girl who works as a waitress to pay her way through college. She's always smiling and willing to help others, though she resents her tiny, flat body.

Reference pic: http://tsuyoshi-kun.deviantart.com/art/Waitress-commission-by-F-AYN-T-142494525


Name: Aya
Age: 15
Height: 5'6"
Hair color/length: Long, black in twin braids
Eye color: Green
Description: A tall, pretty, popular girl in her first year of high school, Aya also gets really good grades. She wishes for a boyfriend, but wants one that's interested in her mind and not in her curvy body.

Reference pic: http://tsuyoshi-kun.deviantart.com/art/Waitress-little-sister-comm-151302505


Name: Saya
Aget: 8
Height: 3'10"
Hair color/length: Dirty blonde, down to the middle of her back
Eye color: Blue
Description: A petite, adorable little girl, Saya is the youngest sibling in her family. She wears a big ribbon in her hair, a gift that Aya gave to her when she was 5. She also carries around with her a stuffed animal, a gift from her oldest sister Maya. She loves her sisters very much, but is shy around other kids her age.

Reference pic: http://tsuyoshi-kun.deviantart.com/art/Waitress-baby-sis-commission-151302833

Rules:

1.) No sexual scenes/nudity for the sisters aside from Maya, as the other two are under 18. (Yes, this means even if the other two sisters are age progressed, you can't do this.)

2.) No killing.

3.) No "other choice" option.

4.) No giantesses, as it's been done to death already. (Mini-giantess is fine.) If you want them to grow, stick to the "getting older" option.

5.) This story is written in the first person. If I see ANY contributions that start with, "You walk into blah blah blah", I will edit them.

6..) All entries must be at least a paragraph long.

Other than that, have fun!
